All templates are fully customizable. Tweak fonts, colors, icons, and layouts to make them yours.

MADE FOR EVERY CREATOR
Perfect for:
- Entrepreneurs and small business owners
- Creators, freelancers, and influencers
- Gamers and eSports teams
- Event planners and DIY designers
- Anyone building a personal or professional brand

UPGRADE TO AI LOGO PRO
Want more power and flexibility? Go Pro to unlock:
- Unlimited AI logo generations
- Premium fonts, overlays, and icons
- Transparent background exports (HD)
- Advanced editing tools and customizations

GET STARTED NOW
Download AI Logo Generator and design your first logo, flyer, or brand asset in just minutes.
Create like a pro, even if you're just getting started.

apps.title: Prêt à Template
apps.description:
Bring your fashion ideas to life! Whether you're sketching your very first sketches or fine-tuning a professional portfolio, Prêt-à-Template gives you everything you need to design with confidence, speed, and style.

Explore your creativity with tools that keep up with your flow, dive straight into designing with intuitive features and ready-made templates that help you stay focused on what matters most: expressing your unique vision!

Look out what Prêt-à-Template have for you:

1,000+ Ready-to-Use Templates

Bodies, garments, shoes, bags, accessories, and jewelry design—all with multiple views and proportions. No more blank pages—simply pick a template and start sketching!

Puzzle Look Feature

Mix and match outfits and accessories in a fun, interactive way. Create endless combinations to perfect every style.

Intuitive Drawing Tools

Enjoy realistic brushes, infinite layers, color fills, and vibrant fabric patterns. Adjust pen thickness, experiment with textures, and bring your designs to life—just like a real fashion illustrator.

• Unlimited Layers & Smart Organization – Easily rearrange, group, and merge layers.
• Minimalist UI – A sleek, user-friendly interface keeps your creativity flowing.
New to fashion sketching? Learn with step-by-step tutorials, master proportions, and refine your croquis.

Already a pro? Elevate your portfolio with advanced layering techniques and custom patterns.
Moodblog & Inspiration Hub

Stay inspired with curated mood boards and trend updates. Explore different styles—from streetwear to haute couture—and keep your designs fresh.

Collaboration & Syncing

• iCloud Sync – Seamlessly work across devices.
• Apple Pencil Support – Sketch with precision using Apple Pencil on iPad. From delicate details to bold patterns, every stroke feels natural and professional.

Who Is Prêt-à-Template For?

• Aspiring Designers – Gain confidence and refine your style.
• Students & Educators – A perfect tool for fashion schools and workshops.
• Professional Creatives – Conceptualize collections faster with organized layers and realistic brushes.
• Fashion Enthusiasts – No experience? No problem! User-friendly tools make designing effortless.

Make Your Fashion Dreams Come True

Design stunning garments, layer intricate patterns, and bring your vision to life—all on your device. Once finished, export and share your designs on social media or collaborate with friends.

Ready to Start Creating?

Download now and try it free for 7 days—no commitments, cancel anytime.

Subscription Pricing & Terms

Prêt-à-Template is free to download with limited features. Unlock full access with a yearly or monthly subscription. Auto-renews unless canceled 24 hours before the current period ends.

Manage your subscription in your Apple Account settings.
Privacy Policy: pretatemplate.com/privacy-policy 
Terms of Use: pretatemplate.com/terms-of-use

Get started today and make your mark on the fashion world—one sketch at a time!

apps.title: Home AI - AI Interior Design
apps.description:
Easily redesign your home in a variety of stunning styles using advanced AI technology.​​ Home AI brings the expertise of an interior designer right into your pocket!

Simply take or upload a photo of the room and space you wish to redesign, choose a style, and receive instant interior design alternatives with unparalleled detail and accuracy. 

Whether you aim to modernize your living room, add a touch of elegance to your bedroom, or completely revamp your kitchen, Home AI has got you covered.
Whether you're an existing homeowner looking for a fresh new look, or a real estate agent staging the perfect property, our app is your ideal design partner. Home AI is here to serve as your personal AI interior design assistant, transforming your space in real time and providing personalized interior designs tailored specifically for your space.

【Effortless Interior Design at Your Fingertips】

Instant Room Makeover: Take a picture of any room in your house, and Home AI's advanced AI technology will instantly generate stunning interior design concepts tailored to your space. Witness the magic unfold as your vision comes to life before your eyes, with every detail thoughtfully optimized.

A World of Interior Design Styles: Unleash your inner decorator with our extensive library of over 10 diverse interior design styles. From the sleek minimalism of modern interior design to the calming serenity of a zen aesthetic, Home AI caters to every taste. Experiment with various styles, mix and match elements, and discover the perfect look that reflects your unique personality.

AI-Powered Recommendations that Go Beyond Style: Home AI doesn't just suggest a new look; it provides insightful recommendations on furniture, decor, and color schemes that perfectly complement your chosen style. Create a harmonious and cohesive space that feels truly lived-in.

【More Than Just Visualization:】

Save and Share Your Concepts: Capture and store your favorite interior design concepts for future reference. Share your transformed spaces with friends, family, or even professional interior designers to gather valuable feedback and refine your vision. Collaborate effortlessly and bring your design dreams to life.

Find Inspiration from Endless Possibilities: Home AI acts as your personal interior design muse, offering endless inspiration to spark your creativity. Explore different concepts and experiment with various styles to find the perfect balance that reflects your unique taste and elevates your space.

【Home AI is the ultimate tool for anyone who wants to:】

Effortlessly visualize interior design ideas and see their dream home come to life
Explore a vast library of interior design styles and discover their perfect aesthetic
Refresh a single room or plan a complete home makeover with ease
Collaborate with friends, family, and professionals to create a personalized space
Spark their creativity and find endless interior design inspiration

Download Home AI today and unlock a world of interior design possibilities! Reimagine your space, redefine your style, and create the home of your dreams with the power of cutting-edge AI technology.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
Privacy Policy: https://homeinterior.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://homeinterior.ai/terms

Do you have a question for us?
info@homeinterior.ai

apps.title: Andalusi: Design Photo & Video
apps.description:
Design Beautifully in Arabic & English – Photos, Videos

Andalusi is the ultimate creative app for modern designers, marketers, content creators, and everyday users who want to create elegant Arabic and bilingual content with ease. Whether you’re designing a photo post, video ad, event invitation, or animated story — Andalusi brings powerful tools and cultural authenticity to your fingertips.


Everything You Need in One App

Design Photos and Videos Together
	•	Add text, stickers, logos, and elements to both images and videos
	•	Apply filters, overlays, and animations directly on video content
	•	Combine multiple media types in a single scene or story
	•	Export your creations as high-quality images or videos (including transparent PNG)

Arabic-Focused Text Tools
	•	Add Arabic and English text with full RTL (right-to-left) support
	•	Curve Arabic text with precise angle and spacing control
	•	Fill your text with images, gradients, or metallic textures
	•	Customize font, size, spacing, line height, shadow, stroke, and blend modes

Thousands of Professional Templates
	•	Ready-made designs for Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, WhatsApp, and more
	•	Categories include weddings, Ramadan, Eid, National Days, graduation, real estate, business, fashion, sports, and quotes
	•	New templates added daily

Animation & Motion Design Tools
	•	Animate any element (text, sticker, image, or video)
	•	Use preset animations: Fade, Zoom, Slide, Bounce, Dissolve, Loop, and more
	•	Timeline editor to control when each layer appears and disappears
	•	Perfect for social videos, animated stories, and content reels

Layers & Visual Control
	•	Work with unlimited layers just like in professional design tools
	•	Show, hide, lock, and reorder elements for clean compositions

Photo & Element Editing Tools
	•	Erase parts of any photo or text with the masking tool
	•	Crop, rotate, resize, and flip photos
	•	Apply handpicked photo filters and overlays with adjustable intensity
	•	Choose from gradients, solid backgrounds, or transparent exports
	•	Remove background instantly with AI-powered background remover — works on people, objects, and product photos with a single tap

Stickers & Creative Elements
	•	Access hundreds of curated stickers and assets for all occasions
	•	New collections added for holidays, cultural moments, and business use
	•	Integrated with The Noun Project: over 5 million design icons and graphics
	•	Exclusive Andalusi sticker collections designed in-house

Fonts & Custom Typography
	•	Huge library of Arabic and English fonts
	•	Import your own fonts (OTF and TTF) with a few taps
	•	Access premium typefaces and calligraphy styles through Andalusi Pro
	•	Professional tools for text styling, color blending, and effects

Exclusive Arabic Calligraphy
	•	Handcrafted calligraphy by professional artists
	•	Browse categories or search for words/phrases
	•	Available in high-resolution PNG and animated GIF formats
	•	Add visual depth with realistic pen textures and ink styles

Color, Texture & Background Tools
	•	Apply golden, silver, wood, and leaf textures with realistic depth
	•	Use our professional palettes for stunning color combinations
	•	Choose image backgrounds from your gallery or stock

Cross-Device Syncing & Sharing
	•	Use Andalusi on both iPhone and iPad
	•	Share designs via AirDrop or save as project files to continue later

Dark Mode & User-Centric UI
	•	Sleek, intuitive interface for fast design workflows
	•	Full support for Dark Mode


Andalusi Pro Subscription

Go beyond the basics with Andalusi Pro. Unlock:
	•	All premium templates, fonts, stickers, and animations
	•	Advanced editing and animation features
	•	Ad-free experience
	•	Monthly and yearly plans available

Whether you’re a content creator, business owner, designer, or just love creating beautiful posts, Andalusi Pro gives you the full power of creative freedom.


Terms of Use: https://andalusi.app/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.andalusi.app/legal/privacy

We’ve updated our UI to match the new liquid glass aesthetic in iOS 26 — smooth, modern, and elegant.

Optimized performance and a seamless experience on Apple’s latest operating system.

apps.title: ArcSite: Floor Plans and CAD
apps.description:
ArcSite is the perfect design tool for all levels—from beginners sketching out floor plans to experienced designers taking on complex projects. No matter your experience, ArcSite puts intuitive CAD within reach of everyone!

ArcSite comes with a 14-day free trial, with a paid subscription thereafter.

QUICK, EASY, AND ACCURATE DRAWINGS

ArcSite is an intuitive CAD design tool that's easy enough for anyone to START SKETCHING FLOOR PLANS RIGHT AWAY and powerful enough to take on advanced CAD projects.

Contractors love ArcSite for home additions, remodeling, audit, cabinetry, site surveys, and flooring projects.


STAY ORGANIZED

Add enhanced visual information to your drawings by embedding on-site photos. Easily annotate or markup any photo or blueprint, and store all files in a secure cloud folder that your whole team can access from anywhere! Perfect for sharing with Project Managers, Field Technicians, Estimators, Contractors, and more.


PRESENT AND CLOSE

With ArcSite, YOUR DRAWINGS LITERALLY PRICE THEMSELVES. Once you’re finished drawing, ArcSite instantly generates a professional estimate or proposal to share with your clients, helping you stand out and win more business.


WHAT ARE PEOPLE SAYING ABOUT ARCSITE?

"I haven't found anything else that comes close to meeting my needs. With ArcSite I save hours on every estimate. Very easy to make accurate and professional-looking drawings, while on-site." - Colin, from JES Foundation Repair

"In my opinion, there is no better program for our line of work, we will be much more productive in the long term" - Paul from Johnson Controls


ArcSite is perfect for:
- Sketching floor plans or room planning with LiDAR
- Room design, remodeling, and blueprint creation
- Advanced 2D CAD Designs
- Generating proposals and estimates
- Professional in-home sales presentations
- Marking up blueprints or PDFs
- Managing or adding photos to site drawings
- Replacing graph paper for quick, scalable sketches


WHO USES ARCSITE?

Sales Teams, Residential Contractors, Fencing Pros, Foundation Repair Experts, Designers, Architects, Creative Homeowners, Remodeling Pros, Inspectors, Auditors, General Contractors, and more.

______________

BENEFITS OF ARCSITE


STAND OUT FROM THE COMPETITION - Look professional by showing your teammates and customers impressive CAD-drawn floor plans, estimates, and detailed proposals—all from within ArcSite.

GO PAPERLESS - Store all of your drawings, LiDAR scans, and proposals securely in the cloud—accessible from any device across your team.

FINISH YOUR DRAWINGS FROM ANYWHERE - Say goodbye to needing desktop CAD software to complete a drawing.


WHAT'S INCLUDED?
* Scaled drawings can be exported to PNG/PDF/DXF/DWG
* Compatible with desktop CAD software such as AutoCAD & Revit
* 1,500+ shapes (or create your own)
* Import and markup PDFs
* Embed photos within your drawing
* Upload to the cloud. Share and co-edit with your coworkers
* Takeoff (quantities of materials)
* Proposal Generation (based on your drawing)

_____________

TERMS


Free 14 day trial.

Terms of Service: http://www.arcsite.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/184541

To continue using ArcSite after your trial, purchase a monthly or annual subscription plan (Draw Basic, Draw Pro, Takeoff, or Estimate). Each tier offers different features; details are in-app.


Auto-Renewable Subscription Info
• Payment charged to Apple Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription renews unless auto-renew is turned off 24 hours before the current period ends
• Renewal charged within 24 hours before the end of the current period
• Manage subscriptions or turn off auto-renewal in Account Settings after purchase
• Unused portion of a free trial is forfeited upon subscription purchase

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’ve made a batch of behind-the-scenes fixes and small improvements to keep your ArcSite experience fast, stable, and frustration-free.
- Smoother interactions
- Minor bugs resolved
- Improved reliability across devices
Keep building with confidence—we’ve got your back.

apps.title: Garden Affairs: Design & Match

Design your perfect home in Garden Affairs, a dazzling Match-3 puzzle game!

Beat clever Match-3 levels with incredible boosters to decorate the mansion of your dreams, foster adorable pets, and unlock new chapters of the exciting story!

Sit back, relax, and enjoy the wild adventures of Alice, Joey, their friends… and their foes! What are you waiting for? Let’s get renovating!

Game Features:
• Customize your estate with hundreds of furniture options to create a unique mansion
• Interact with intriguing characters and follow the dramatic story - full of surprises, action, and romance
• Relax with a multitude of fun match-3 puzzles
• Enjoy new levels with unique features which are constantly being added
• Play seasonal events for stunning redesigns
• Take on limited time challenges to win extra special rewards

Follow us for the latest news!

Design your perfect home in Garden Affairs, a dazzling Match-3 puzzle game!

Beat clever Match-3 levels with incredible boosters to decorate the mansion of your dreams, foster adorable pets, and unlock new chapters of the exciting story!

Sit back, relax, and enjoy the wild adventures of Alice, Joey, their friends… and their foes! What are you waiting for? Let’s get renovating!

Game Features:
• Customize your estate with hundreds of furniture options to create a unique mansion
• Interact with intriguing characters and follow the dramatic story - full of surprises, action, and romance
• Relax with a multitude of fun match-3 puzzles
• Enjoy new levels with unique features which are constantly being added
• Play seasonal events for stunning redesigns
• Take on limited time challenges to win extra special rewards

Follow us for the latest news!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenAffairsGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenaffairsgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_affairs

apps.title: BUD: Create, Design and Play
apps.description:
*Welcome to BUD: Unleash Your Creativity in 3D*
Embark on a Journey of Imagination with BUD
BUD is not just a game; it's a vast, vibrant world of 3D interactive content, where your imagination takes the lead. Join a community with millions of players around the world, and experience the thrill of bringing your ideas to life in an expansive 3D universe.

UNRIVLAED AVATAR CUSTOMIZATION
- Design Your Fashion: Dive into our comprehensive customization toolkit where you can design your own clothing. From stylish dresses to cool streetwear, your fashion sense knows no bounds.
- Artistic Freedom: Embrace your inner artist by drawing and creating your own unique outfits. Whether it's casual wear, formal attire, or something fantastical, your creativity is the only limit.
- Community Marketplace: Explore millions of items in our bustling community marketplace. Mix, match, and experiment with a vast array of styles created by fellow BUD users from around the globe.

BOUNDLESS 3D CREATION
- Build Interactive Experiences: With our user-friendly 3D tools, create dynamic and engaging 3D experiences. Whether it's a serene landscape or an adventurous obstacle course, your vision can come to life here.
- Explore a Universe of Games: Delve into millions of games created by our talented community of creators. Each game is a doorway to new adventures, stories, and experiences—crafted by users, for users.

SUPPORT & MORE DETAILS
- Need assistance? Contact our support team at support@budcreate.xyz.
- Terms and Conditions: https://cdn.joinbudapp.com/privacy_policy/terms.html
- Privacy Policy: https://cdn.joinbudapp.com/privacy_policy/privacy.html

Dive into the World of BUD
Download now and start your extraordinary journey in a world where creativity is limitless and every adventure is unique!

raw_data.releaseNotes: To enhance your experience with BUD, we regularly roll out updates. These updates are designed to fix bugs and optimize the speed and reliability of the system, ensuring that BUD serves you more effectively.

apps.title: Logo Maker - Logo Design Shop
apps.description:
Logo Maker - Logo design shop lets you create a stunning logo for your business in seconds, even if you have no design skills. Logo Maker allows you to create logo, icons, symbols, watermark, business card or any type of professional design like poster, banner, flyer and ads design. Design creative, modern, artistic and professional logos for your business or personal use.

Logo Maker is the fast and easiest app ever to create beautiful logo. Simply choose from over 1500+ customizable creative logo templates created by our professional designers. Then edit your chosen design using more than 600 fonts, icons, symbol and background design resources. You can create vintage logo, watercolor logo, retro style logo, artistic logo, abstract logo, designer logo and much more.

The best part of this app is that you don’t need any design experience. Just pick a template and get creative!


• 1500+ READY TO USE LOGO TEMPLATES

Logo Maker provides you a variety of fully editable and customizable logo templates. Each logo design is fully adjustable and customizable. So, you can make awesome logo in minutes. The logo collection is categorized with popular themes like Animals, Business, Vintage, Retro, Luxury, Iconic, Basic, Sports, Watercolor, Letter based, Typography, Abstract, Art, Natural & Organic, Gym, Fitness, Yoga, Badges, Food & Drinks, Beauty & Fashion, Music, Education, Restaurant, Nature, Automative, Real Estate and much more.


• 8500+ GRAPHICS (ICONS, SYMBOLS & FONTS)
Logo Maker has over 8500+ design resources, including icons, modern fonts, symbols, shapes and HD backgrounds. All the graphics are carefully selected by our professional designers. The graphics & icons collection is categorized with popular themes like Birds & Animals, Gradient, Floral, Watercolour & Golden Paint Stains, Nature, Sports, Foods, Alphabets, Grunge Shapes, Colorful, Science & Technology, Ribbons, Shield, Geometric, Entertainment, Fruits & Vegetables, Real Estate and much more.


• PROFESSIONAL DESIGN TOOLS
You can design creative and pixel perfect logos with the help of different design tools like text adjustment, stroke, size, color, smart mask(erase), curve and nudge(move).


• SAVE YOUR LOGOS
Logo maker allows you to save your logo designs or work. So you can edit them anytime anywhere.


• HIGH-RESOLUTION LOGO
Save and share your logos as transparent PNG or JPEG images or Export as a PDF. Transparent PNG images can be saved up to 4000 x 4000 resolution.



SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS:

Logo Maker is free to download. Upgrade to Logo Maker Pro for unlimited access to premium content for $6.99/month.
• Prices may vary by region and are converted to local currency.• Subscriptions auto-renew unless turned off 24 hours before the end of the current period.• Manage subscriptions in your iTunes account settings.

Start your free trial today and unlock the full potential of Logo Maker!


Read our terms and conditions at https://infostring.in/logomaker/terms

Read our privacy policy at https://infostring.in/logomaker/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
iOS 26–ready with a minor UI changes for a smoother editor.
• New logo templates, fresh fonts & graphic packs
• Faster performance and stability improvements for quicker exports

apps.title: Home Design 3D - GOLD EDITION
apps.description:
HOME DESIGN 3D - CREATE YOUR DREAM HOUSE IN 3D 

Create your dream house design with the world's leading home design app, trusted by over 60 million users in more than 150 countries.
Transform your house design idea into stunning reality with our ultimate 3D house designer, featuring an intuitive planner and immersive 3D. Perfect for interior design, construction preparation, and rapid iterations across every design space, from concept to completion.

PLAN & DESIGN YOUR DREAM HOME IN 3D 
• Draw floor plans in 2D, then instantly view in immersive 3D and 5D perspectives
• Professional house designer tools for precise construction measurements
• Create multi-story home renovation design projects with unlimited floors
• Adjust wall thickness, height & angles for accurate planning
• Map your entire house from ground to rooftop across every design space

FURNISH & DECORATE EVERY SPACE 
• Browse thousands of items to decorate living rooms, kitchens, bedrooms & gardens
• Customize furniture size, color & placement in each design space
• Save multiple versions for easy comparison - redesign entire rooms instantly
• Redecor entire rooms instantly and compare different styles in seconds
• Test layouts with our advanced planner before starting your home renovation
• Professional interior design tools with fine-tuned lighting & palettes
• Perfect room planner for decorating and interior design projects

VISUALIZE & WALK THROUGH 
• Photorealistic 3D rendering - walk through your dream house as if you were there
• Experience your Home Design in 5D through virtual reality with VR export
• Day/Night slider to preview natural lighting in every design space
• Real-time 3D exploration of your house design and construction plans

IMPORT ANY HOUSE DESIGN 
• Import existing projects and blueprints and draw directly on top
• Import custom textures to personalize and decorate every design space with unique materials
• Draw a floor plan in 2D and explore it instantly in 3D from your imported plans

COLLABORATE, SHARE AND EXPORT 
• Keep a private design space library & share selected rooms once ready
• Export projects across devices and collaborate with other house designers
• Publish to our community, get decorating tips, feedback on your house design, redecor and iterate
• Share your architecture projects via email, Dropbox, OneDrive
• Share your creations with the Home Design 3D community on www.homedesign3d.net
• Cross-platform compatibility so you can continue projects on any device

MADE FOR EVERY HOME CREATOR 
• All-in-one planner for construction, remodeling & interior design
• Streamlined workflow for interior design and construction planning
• Intuitive design tool for beginners and professional house designers
• Freedom to decorate, redesign, and refine every design space
• From studio apartments to villas — design any house project

WHY MILLIONS CHOOSE HOME DESIGN 3D 
• FAST START: Draw in 2D, switch to 3D, and iterate in seconds
• PRO TOOLS: Accurate walls, angles & dimensions for real construction work
• DESIGN FREEDOM: Endless furniture, materials & palettes to decorate
• LIVE WALKTHROUGHS: Explore your house design in real-time 3D and 5D
• SMART WORKFLOWS: Advanced room planner, landscape planner & lighting tools
• HOME MAKEOVER: Redecor entire rooms instantly and compare styles in seconds.
• GLOBAL COMMUNITY: Connect with professional and amateur house designers worldwide

Works offline | No internet required
Illustrated tutorial included

USER REVIEW
“Made my home design decisions easy. I could decorate rooms and preview in 3D before buying.” 
“Great for interior design and construction planning — the planner saved me time and money.” 

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula
Privacy Policy: https://en.homedesign3d.net/privacy-policy
Twitter: @homedesign3d
Facebook: facebook.com/homedesign3d
Pinterest: boards/homedesign3d
Instagram: @homedesign3d_off

apps.title: Bazaart AI Photo Editor Design
apps.description:
Bazaart is an easy-to-use AI photo editor, video editor, and design app. No design background needed. Create fast for online selling, digital marketing, and social media. Get your design superpowers today!

What you can make

For your business:
Product photos, home listings, model shots, profile pics, logos, flyers, ads, posters.

For your social media:
Reels, TikTok videos, stories, posts, slideshows, thumbnails, stop motion videos.

For your everyday life: 
Collages, cards, invitations, memes, WhatsApp stickers, backgrounds, wallpapers, GIFs, works of art.

AI tools
• Edit with AI: change or replace anything in a photo with simple prompts
• Remove background: background remover for photos and videos
• Remove: remove objects and people from any photo
• Magic Background: create on-brand, AI-generated scenes for products and portraits
• AI Image: turn text prompts into images
• AI Restyle: restyle photos in one tap (from product try-ons to creative looks)
• Magic Edit: select an area and replace it using a prompt
• Enhance: improve photo quality in a tap
• Expand: extend your photos to any size
• Lift: cut the subject from the background, move and resize it

Photo and video editing tools
• Cut out with crop, scissors, eraser, and shape cut-out
• Adjust exposure, contrast, saturation, vibrance, warmth, tint, shadows, highlights, fade, sharpness, and blur
• Make elements stand out with outlines and shadows
• Combine photos and videos with blending modes
• Batch edit to speed through multiple photos
• Blur background of any photo for a portrait look

Design tools
• Create in custom sizes and popular presets
• Sketch and draw freely
• Curve text on arcs and circles
• Style text with quick presets
• Fine-tune text alignment, letter spacing, and line spacing
• Auto-snapping for perfect alignment
• Nudge tool for precise positioning
• Work with layers; every change is reversible
• Organize projects into folders
• Save projects to the cloud to keep them in sync

Content that speeds you up
• Beautiful templates made by designers
• Thousands of backgrounds, graphics, shapes, and animated graphics
• Photo and video effects
• Large font library, plus add your own
• Use photos and videos from albums, camera, files, or stock

Export and share
• Save images as JPG or PNG with transparency
• Save videos or animated GIFs
• Save as PDF
• Share anywhere

Upgrade your design experience

Bazaart Premium
Access to all tools and content, higher usage of AI tools, save without watermark, and VIP support.

Bazaart Super (perfect for small businesses)
Everything in Premium, plus maximum usage of AI tools and 100 GB of cloud storage.

Terms of Service: https://www.bazaart.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.bazaart.com/terms/#privacy

Need help? Email support@bazaart.com and we’ll get back to you quickly.

BAZAART is a registered trademark of Bazaart Ltd.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
In this update you'll find:
- Design superpowers to boost your creativity
- Fresh content to make your designs slay
- Bug fixes and performance improvements to smoothen your experience

One more thing…
If you love Bazaart, please rate us on the App Store! We’ll be forever thankful to you.

Happy designing!
The Bazaart Team

apps.title: piZap: Design & Edit Photos
apps.description:
Create a photo layout that’s sure to turn some heads with piZap. Whip up a viral post, stories and memes, edit and enhance photos, put together an amazing photo grid and so much more! piZap has loads of fonts, stickers, borders, filters, and stock images to choose from to help you create a design that’s uniquely your own. Best of all, most of our tools and features come at no cost to you. 

Professional-grade photo editing is at your fingertips with piZap. Say goodbye to complicated design and photo layout software and say hello to your all-in-one picture editor that’s just as easy to use as it is fun! What will you create next?

PIZAP FEATURES

DESIGN ANYTHING – SOCIAL POSTS, COLLAGES, MEMES & MORE
- There are literally thousands of ways you can create an image with piZap’s Design Tools in a snap!
- Photo Collage Maker: Create a custom photo grid with 1000’s of unique layouts to choose from
- Social Media Photo Editor: Edit photo masterpieces for all of your favorite social channels
- Meme Maker: Memes are fun! Why not create your very own? With piZap, you can!
- Everything from Instagram to LinkedIn, you can design posts for all social media formats
- Design photos & graphics for flyers, websites, presentations, or create your own emojis with ease

INTUITIVE PHOTO EDITING
- You don’t need to be a Photoshop expert to get up and running quickly with piZap
- Use photo crop tools to capture all you want and get rid of everything you don’t
- Apply unique filters for a perfect social media photo layout
- Smooth over imperfections with touch up & photo retouching
- Adjust the colors & tones of your photos with just a few taps
- Use cut-out tools to create

DESIGN PHOTOS & LAYOUTS
- Apply frames & borders to your photos for a personalized touch
- Use the paint tool & graphics to create a masterpiece
- Adding dimension to your photos is a breeze with our photo layering tool
- Choose from over 1.8 million royalty free stock images
- Discover over 100 photo filters & effects

PROFESSIONAL GRADE GRAPHIC DESIGN MADE EASY
- With 1000’s of premade templates you can get started fast and skip the blank paper stage
- Create flyers, social media posts and so much more!
- Choose from hundreds of fonts and text styles to customize your creation
- Print your designs in a snap with print ready layouts
- Resize your projects to fit all popular social media & print sizes with the click of a button

SOCIAL MEDIA DESIGN
- All your social media design tools in one easy-to-use design app!
- Create fun and engaging social media posts
- Whip up a Facebook, LinkedIn or Twitter header image in minutes
- Put together motivational quotes, sayings & tips

ADD TEXT, BORDERS & STICKERS
- Get creative with your photo design! Enjoy these fun graphic art features:
- 367 unique & fun fonts
- 4530 stickers
- 304 borders
- And more festive pic tools
- Curved text tool
- Text styles like outline, drop shadow and text bubbles

Quickly and easily design photos & anything you can think of with piZap! Download it today to get started!

UPGRADE TO PIZAP PRO:
- 7-day free trial
- Unlock everything
- No ads
- Use on all of your devices

piZap Pro Annual - $59.99 usd/year, billed annually ($4.99/month)
piZap Pro Monthly - $9.99 usd/month, billed monthly

- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Terms of use: https://www.pizap.com/privacypolicy#terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.pizap.com/privacypolicy

apps.title: Word villas - Crossword&Design
apps.description:
Design your dream home with Word Villas! This game is the perfect combination of Word Puzzles and Home Decorating. Start your adventure by helping Rachel renovate her old house and start a new life! 

Solve challenging word puzzles to renovate and decorate the various rooms and areas in the house. Fix up what's already there, redesign to give new lift, and choose from impressive options! Give the old mansion a complete makeover!

Interact with many vivid characters and unlock an addictive story involving new friends, romance, adventure, and drama! 

What makes Word Villas so special?

● Unique gameplay: a combination of word puzzles and home decorating provides a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience.

● Home design: 
   - Use your design skills and creativity to renovate and decorate the house with various styles and themes;
   - Make your own choice from hundreds of unique furniture and decor.
   - Explore the house and unlock more areas for renovation.

● Exciting word puzzles: 
   - Simply swipe the letters to build words to collect rewards!
   - Challenge yourself with different Modes, including Normal, Hard and Expert.
   - Thousands of unique levels await, and more are being added!

● Fun characters and a story full of twists:
   - Say goodbye to the past mess, start a new life! Establish and expand your own B&B business.
   - Make friends and experience a new life, all while restoring the old mansion. Will romance bloom? Will you find your true love?

What are you waiting for? Solve challenging word puzzles, unleash your creativity, and start your makeover now!


Love Word Villas? Follow us on Facebook to stay up-to-date on Word Villas news, contests, polls and other fun stuff: 
https://www.facebook.com/WordVillas/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1. A new room and more main storyline
2. Bug fixes and other optimizations

apps.title: iScape: Landscape Design
apps.description:
iScape is the No. 1 app for landscape design. We are here to help you create beautiful outdoor living areas. Whether you’re an Industry Professional, or a DIY Homeowner, iScape has you covered.

As featured in Forbes, HGTV, HBO, The New York Times, USA Today, Fox, and many more!

“If you’re DIY’ing it, iScape makes it easy to plan out what to buy and how to put it all together. If you’re hiring a landscaper, the app can help you explore ideas and share your vision.” - Forbes

"It is user friendly and has features that include a virtual pen, the ability to insert objects and more. This is considered one of the best landscape design apps." - Borst Landscape Design

"Wish you could see how your home would look with professional landscaping? With iScape, you can create a digital model of your home's yard. Feature your favorite plants, so you can see the design before digging at all." - HGTV

Check out just some of the great iScape benefits:

Landscape Business Tools - iScape pro subscription provides the ability to create a proposal directly from the app in real time. Whip up a design, output a proposal, set pricing, modify descriptions and create a professional PDF with your quote and custom business info in minutes!

Visualize the Finished Project - Whether you’re going to do-it-yourself or hire a pro to help, you’ll know how it should look before the project even starts.

Design in Your Own Space - Seamlessly blend your physical and digital living spaces using augmented reality (3D) or traditional designs (2D).

Share with Others - Collaborate with a landscape pro, your customers or your spouse and use iScape to share your vision and make it a reality.

Complete the Project - We inventory all the products and items within your iScape design to make purchasing smooth and easy.

Around the globe, more than 5 million designs have been created with iScape helping both Industry Professionals and Homeowners save time, energy and money.

What else is the world saying about iScape?

“If you’re looking to tackle a landscaping project, check out iScape, which allows you to overlay virtual flowerbeds, trees and shrubs on top of photos of your home so that you can test out your landscaping ideas before you ever head to the garden supply store.” - Fox News

“To plan the perfect patch, look no further than iScape.” - Wall Street Journal

“If you’re looking to ramp up your curb appeal, we recommend the iScape app to create virtual landscaping." - The Washington Post

“When you’re planning a new garden or considering a change to an established one, it can be difficult to visualize the results. This is where iScape comes in handy.” - The NY Times

AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL DETAILS FOR SUBSCRIPTIONS:
• Subscriptions are managed in user Account Settings after purchase.
• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account.
• Cancel renewal anytime. Subscription automatically renews unless cancelled at least 24-hours prior to period end.
• Account will be charged for renewal for the same subscription you purchased within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
• No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

Privacy Policy: https://iscapeit.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.iscapeit.com/terms

We really hope that you enjoy iScape. We are continuously striving to make the experience better and better. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any feedback and/or questions at support@iscapeit.com. User input has made a tremendous impact at iScape and we greatly appreciate it!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thanks for using iScape! Here's what's under the hood in this update:
* New: Projects now save automatically
* Bugfixes and performance improvements

We look forward to your feedback!

apps.title: uMake: 3D CAD Modeling, Design
apps.description:
Transform Your Ideas into Professional 3D Models - The Award-Winning CAD app for iPad & iPhone


OVERVIEW

Create professional 3D CAD models, architectural designs, and product concepts with uMake - awarded iPad Pro App of the Year. Perfect for architects, interior designers, product designers, students, and 3D modeling professionals seeking powerful CAD tools on the go.


PROFESSIONAL 3D DESIGN MADE SIMPLE

- Industrial-grade 3D CAD modeling with NURBS technology
- Complete 3D design toolkit for architecture and interior design
- Professional product design and prototype development
- Advanced 3D modeling capabilities for engineering projects
- Intuitive interface for both CAD experts and beginners

NEW! POWERFUL AI DESIGN TOOLS

Supercharge your creativity with the latest AI features in uMake.
- Instantly apply unique styles to your sketches, 3D models, or photos
- Turn 2D images into 3D objects and place them into dynamic scenes
- Generate stunning, styled renderings in seconds with a single tap

Combine sketching, modeling, and AI to bring your boldest ideas to life—faster than ever.


PROFESSIONAL CAD FEATURES

- Professional NURBS-based 3D modeling engine
- Precision CAD tools: extrusion, revolve, array, and boolean operations
- Architectural design tools with accurate measurements
- Advanced surface modeling for product design
- Complete 3D modeling toolkit for interior design projects


READY-TO-USE DESIGN RESOURCES

- Professional CAD templates for architecture and product design
- Extensive 3D model library for interior design
- Architectural elements and building components
- Product design starter kits and components
- Premium content available with uMake+ subscription


PROFESSIONAL-GRADE TOOLS

- Apple Pencil support
- 3D sketching with intelligent construction planes
- Precise dimensioning tools for CAD modeling
- Layer management for complex 3D designs
- Advanced grouping for architectural elements


INDUSTRY-STANDARD COMPATIBILITY

- Import/Export CAD files: STEP, IGES, OBJ, STL, USDz
- Compatible with SketchUp and 3D Warehouse (SKP)
- Seamless workflow with major CAD software:
- SolidWorks, Fusion 360, Rhino 3D, AutoCAD, Revit, ArchiCAD
- Other leading 3D modeling software


VISUALIZATION & PRESENTATION

- Professional rendering engine for architectural visualization
- Interior design presentation tools
- Product design visualization with materials and lighting
- AR visualization for architectural and interior design
- Built-in presentation tools for client meetings


PERFECT FOR PROFESSIONAL USE

- Architects and Interior Designers
- Product Designers and Engineers
- CAD Professionals and 3D Modelers
- Industrial Design Studios
- Architecture Students and Educators


LEARNING RESOURCES

- Professional CAD tutorials
- 3D modeling guides
- Architecture and design workflows
- Product design techniques
- Comprehensive knowledge base


AWARDS & RECOGNITION

- 2015 iPad Pro App of the Year
- Best of App Store 2015
- Editors' Choice


CONNECT WITH US

- Email: hello@umake.com
- Instagram: @umake


SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION

- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account once you confirm the purchase.
- Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of your subscription period. To opt out, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Manage changes to your subscription in the iTunes Account Settings.
- Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited when you purchase a uMake subscription.


LEGAL

Privacy Policy: http://www.umake.com/legal/privacy
Terms of Use: http://www.umake.com/legal/terms

From styled renderings to fully composed scenes, bring your ideas to life in seconds—directly inside uMake Space.

apps.title: Hover - measure, design, quote
apps.description:
The one app to scope and sell every construction project. All your trades. All your people. All in one place. Contractors, adjusters, and homeowners trust Hover to get the job done.

For Construction Pros:
Measure everything. Get detailed, to-the-inch accurate exterior and interior home measurements from just 8 smartphone photos or by uploading a blueprint plan. No measuring tape or tracing required. For roof area, roof pitch, roof area, siding, soffits, eaves, fascia, trim, gutters, windows, doors, and more.

Document anything. Easily and consistently capture project notes, annotations, and photos at any point during the job. Leverage detailed templates covering inspections, liability, punchlists, team hand-offs, and more—or create your own custom templates.

Design to sell. From inspiration tools powered by AI to interactive 3D home models, all from photos or a blueprint upload. Visualize your projects, the products you sell, share it with anyone, or export it as a BIM file for other applications. And when you’re ready, add all the final touches like landscaping with photo-realistic rendered home designs.

Takeoffs in two clicks. Generate ready-to-order Material Lists directly from Hover's measurements. Access over a hundred customizable building material templates, built by industry experts and from the most trusted brands, to generate complete Material Lists—without number crunching or manual data entry. You can mix materials, trades, and even submit building material orders digitally to your local supplier.

For Homeowners:
Working with an insurance company? Hover helps streamline your underwriting or claims process.

Want to remodel or redesign your home? Find inspiration with Hover’s free home design tools to see what your potential project will look like ahead of time. Works for both exterior and interior remodeling projects. Hover can help you design and build your dream home.

Questions? Get in touch anytime: support@hover.to

raw_data.releaseNotes:

We've made improvements and fixed some issues. 

* 'Mine' filter to be listed 1st on property page

Feedback, feature requests, or success stories, please share them with our team at support@hover.to. 
We look forward to hearing from you!

apps.title: Color Widgets
apps.description:
Color Widgets makes adding aesthetic and handy widgets to your Home Screen and Lock Screen easy. Browse thousands of predesigned widgets or, better yet, design your own with the easy-to-use widget customizer. Color Widgets doesn't just stop at widgets...you can also discover endless icon packs, themes, and wallpapers to perfectly match your aesthetic and interests. From customizing your widgets to changing your app icons and wallpaper, Color Widgets is THE destination to transform your device.

UNLIMITED WIDGETS
Customize each widget with no limits by adding photos, selecting styles, editing fonts, crafting a unique color scheme, and so much more. Here’s a glimpse at some of our most-used widgets:
● Photo Widget
● Time, Date & Battery Widgets
● Countdown Widget
● Weather Widgets
● Apple Music & Spotify Widget
● Calendar Widgets
● Custom Text/Quote Widget
● Activity Tracking & Pedometer Widgets
● Solar & Moon Phase Widgets
…and dozens more!

14,000+ THEMES & WALLPAPERS
Immerse yourself in the #1 largest collection of phone themes, with thousands of user-crafted designs that blend widgets, icon packs, and wallpapers into stunning aesthetics. Set entire themes in just a few clicks to fully transform your Lock & Home Screen. Plus, with new themes published daily by users and artists around the globe, the possibilities for customization are endless!

AESTHETIC ICON PACKS
Customize your app icons in seconds with Color Widgets’ custom icon packs. Replace your default app icons with custom-themed icon packs in thousands of designs. Apply a custom icon pack in just a few clicks with Color Widgets’ quick setup, or save the icons to your camera roll and set them in Shortcuts.

FREE
Enjoy Color Widgets for free, with an optional upgrade to supercharge your experience. If you decide to go Pro, enjoy a free 3-day trial and then it renews at USD$4.99/month or USD$19.99/year.

PRIVACY-FIRST
We believe that customizing your device shouldn’t come at the expense of your privacy, which is why we collect and store as little personal information as possible. Read more on how we protect your data in our privacy policy & terms of service: https://colorwidgets.app/privacy.

MORE
Color Widgets works on all iPhones, iPads, and Macs running iOS 14 or later and macOS 11 or later. If you choose to use the health widgets, Color Widgets integrates with the iOS Health app to collect and display health data – such as daily step count or activity progress – seamlessly from your iPhone or Apple Watch.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thanks for being part of the Color Widgets community! We update our app regularly with new features and bug fixes to make the best device customization experience. If you’re enjoying Color Widgets, please consider leaving a review.

apps.description:
Build your fashion dream world in SUITSME - your new favorite dress-up game! Unleash your inner stylist, boost your creativity and compete in thrilling fashion battles against other players.

Enjoy Your Сomprehensive Virtual Closet
Immerse yourself in a world of fashion with our extensive collection of clothing, accessories, makeup, and hairstyles. From trendy tops and stylish bottoms to dazzling jewelry and bold makeup looks, there's something to suit every taste. Experiment and have fun creating your perfect outfit.

Take Part in Unique Fashion Challenges
From casual chic to red carpet glam, we'll provide you with unique themes and let your creativity run wild. Create stunning looks and prove you're a true fashion guru! apps.title: Rhonna Designs
apps.description:
You become the graphic designer, when you edit and embellish photos, create word art, and make memorable posts with unique designs and beautiful, original fonts. 

Need to come up with stunning invitations?
Have a deadline for a marketing post?
Need to create branding for a sophisticated client?
Want to record baby’s first week/month/year?

Enter Rhonna Designs! Fun! Easy! and High Resolution! All the tools you need to create beautifully branded posts, fabulous invitations, or clever, eye-catching memes. 

AND… the power of this app is amplified when you open your current project in Rhonna Designs Magic and Rhonna Collage to access even more design features, such as: adding a water mark or logo overlay, using the powerful erasing and mask tool, and saving time with predesigned collage templates.

Features: 
Select from designs and fonts, updated monthly, from multiple artists and designers.
Adjust transparency, color, shadows, outlines, size & angles as you create with the text & design features. 
Add masks to any photo using the variety of unique designs; even has the capability of allowing you to add multiple designs or fonts to the mask!  
Video Tutorials can be found on the front page of the app under the yellow heart

Follow the creator of this award winning app on Instagram for tutorials, news and sneak peeks! @rhonnadesignsofficial

apps.title: Wordington: Word Find & Design
apps.description:
Help Emma renovate her Grandpa’s beautiful old mansion and follow her story as she tries to bring this manor together. Design the interior and exterior of the house and choose between elegant decorations to give a unique feel to the house! 

Solve crossword puzzles to progress in the story! Beat and complete these crossword levels to unlock new chapters and new rooms to renovate and decorate! Explore the manor’s garden or the garage, renovate the library and create your own party room to celebrate! 

Adventures are around every turn, including a little bit of romance.

The game features all sorts of excitement:
- Fun Word Game: Solve challenging word puzzles by forming words from the given letters.
- Interior Design: Create your dream house! Repair the damage and renovate the old mansion! 

- Multiple Decorations: Choose between different options and decide how the manor will look!
- Exciting crosswords: This game really needs a true word puzzle master, are you the one?
- Experience the Story: Discover Wordington’s story and all the secrets it holds! 
- Amusing characters: Meet Pizza David, Handyman Bob and more. Is there possibly some romance going on between Emma and David? 
- A cute pet: Meet the cute dog Max and see what adventures he brings.

The old mansion is in desperate need of a makeover. Emma can’t do it alone. You can show off your decorating skills by choosing various components for the bedroom, living room, kitchen, garden, and more. Maximize the fun by being in control of all of the design decisions. You’ll get to pick and choose many of the new items that go into the manor, ensuring that you have a say on the final appearance.

As soon as you solve your first crossword puzzle, you are on your way to help Emma fix up the old mansion and turn it into your dream house!

Learn more about the game on Facebook:
Wordington 

Questions? Contact our support team by sending an email to support@qiiwi.com

Wordington VIP Membership Subscription:
Some items in the app require VIP Membership, such as free daily spins, ad free experience and free wordpass access. VIP Membership is a
auto-renewing subscription. 

VIP Membership will renew within 24 hours before the subscription period ends, and you will be charged through your iTunes account. You can manage and cancel your subscription in your iTunes Account Settings at any time. If you purchase new VIP Membership subscription during a free trial you will forfeit any free trial period remaining from your first purchase.

Our privacy policy and terms of service can be found at http://www.qiiwi.com/user-data and Apple Standard EULA at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Welcome to yet another great update of Wordington!

WHAT'S NEW:
- General improvements and bug fixes.

Enjoy!

apps.title: Home Design 3D : Designverse
apps.description:
Designverse makes designing and renovating your home a breeze with its user-friendly tools and lifelike visuals. Whether you're dreaming up a new layout or playing with different decorations, Designverse has everything you need.

Just use your phone's camera to scan your space and watch as it transforms into a 3D model. You can sketch out new floor plans and see them come to life instantly. Move around your virtual home like it's a game and personalize every detail, from wall colors to furniture placement.

Here's what you can do:

- Use easy tools that anyone can master
- Turn scans into 3D scenes in a snap
- Draw and edit floor plans effortlessly
- Customize your interiors and decor
- Enjoy realistic graphics and smooth animations
- Switch between different measurement systems
- Access a wide range of items in the library

Ready to design your dream home? Dive into Designverse today and let your creativity shine!

Privacy Policy: https://www.designverse3d.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://www.designverse3d.com/terms-of-use

apps.title: Interior Design PRO
apps.description:
"Interior Design for iPad" is now "Interior Design PRO" – a cutting-edge app meticulously crafted for Professional Interior Designers, yet effortlessly intuitive for everyone. Seamlessly bring your visions to life by designing any space with an extensive array of real-life objects and materials. Elevate your creativity and showcase your designs in unparalleled detail with stunning 8k photo-realistic images, setting a new standard in interior design innovation. We've maintained the familiar look and feel of its predecessor to eliminate any learning curve, ensuring you can seamlessly enjoy all the new features in this release, with much more to come.

:new: Now available on Mac!
Enjoy all the features you love about Interior Design PRO on your Mac, with full support for trackpad and mouse. Compatible with any Mac using an Apple Silicon processor (M1, M2 and higher) and running macOS 12 or higher. Access Interior Design PRO across your Mac, iPad, and iPhone with a single subscription and the same iCloud ID.

Interior Design PRO offers auto-renewal subscription. The app itself and its content is completely free, while renders and a few professional features like 8K renders, model scanner and custom logo require a subscription which auto-renews every 30 days unless cancelled.

Please read the following about the auto-renewable nature of subscriptions:
• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
• Subscription automatically renews at the end of your current subscription period unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours prior to end of the current period.
• You can manage or turn off auto-renewal in your Apple ID Account Settings any time after purchase.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
• Privacy policy - https://www.tapglance.com/privacy/
• Terms of use - https://www.tapglance.com/terms/

raw_data.releaseNotes: • Minor optimizations and performance updates.

apps.title: Tenada: Photo & Graphic Design
apps.description:
Tenada is the image, design, and photo editing app that makes you stand out. Go beyond ordinary design and easily create unique collages, logos, artworks, and social media posts. With Tenada’s powerful 3D editor, you can achieve professional-level results without any prior experience.

Photo Editor
 • One-tap background remover for photos  
 • 300+ animation presets included  
 • Add stickers and VFX effects to your photos  
 • 100+ free fonts plus custom font upload support  
 • Themed backgrounds and free stock image library  
 • Save as transparent PNGs and export with chroma key video  
 • Quick crop tools and 4K high-resolution image export

Advanced 3D Editor
 • Full 360° rotation for images, videos, text, and stickers  
 • 3D Layer Magic to arrange elements in true 3D space  
 • Motion graphic presets that turn photos and images into dynamic videos  
 • Text editing with donut, circle, and wave shapes  
 • Flexible effect presets to control speed, color, size, and intensity  
 • Professional design tools: shadows, textures, alpha blending, stencil effects

Collage Maker
 • Unique 3D collages with floor reflection effects  
 • Artistic photo collages in book cover and art gallery styles  
 • Classic and 3D layout templates  
 • Screen, film, and Polaroid-style photo and video designs

Logo Maker
 • Create one-of-a-kind logo designs with your own text  
 • Exclusive Tenada styles: spotlight, metallic, stencil, and more  
 • Character, illustration, and watercolor logo options  
 • Animated logo maker with motion effects

Artworks & Templates
 • Templates for intros, isometric layouts, and kinetic typography  
 • Transform photos and videos into art with masking posters & shatter effects  
 • Premium posters, flyers, and invitations for sports, events, and celebrations  
 • Design templates to turn photos into stylish profile images  
 • Pop art, motion graphics, and chroma key video support

Tenada Pro
 • Unlock 1000+ premium templates to complete your designs  
 • Intuitive yet powerful animation editor for immersive motion graphics  
 • Remove watermarks and access every tool without limits

Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends. 
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase, and you can manage your subscription anytime in account settings.

Terms of Service: https://tenada.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/TermAndPolicy/TENADA_Terms.htm

Privacy Policy: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/19084004

Support: contact@tenadacorp.com

raw_data.releaseNotes:
The app has been optimized to provide a smoother and more stable user experience.
For any questions about the app, please contact us at contact@tenadacorp.com

apps.title: Vector & SVG Maker - Assembly
apps.description:
Create logos, icons, illustrations, and more using powerful, easy to use features usually only found in professional desktop software. Assembly is the revolutionary vector design tool that lets you imagine and produce quality work in half the time.

Skip the sketch book and rough out designs by quickly combining predesigned elements. From basic primitives to ornate illustrations, cut, combine and intersect shapes creating complex groups of graphics. Dive a layer deeper to manipulate your designs further with the powerful point editing system using industry standard bezier curves.

Get professional results using powerful tools found in high-end graphic design suites. Design quickly and easily using a simple interface that provides only the features you need as you need them. Output in high resolution JPG and PNG as well as popular vector formats SVG and PDF.

Powerful yet intuitive, Assembly is the perfect creative tool. Simple professional vector design for artists of any background or skill level. Just the tools you need without all the bloat you don’t. Design anything, anywhere.

= = = = =

FEATURES:

- Point editing with bezier curves
- Combine, cut-out and intersect shapes
- Import SVG / PNG / JPG and export SVG / PNG / PDF / JPG up to 8192 x 8192
- Complete text engine with 25 versatile, hand-selected fonts or import your own
- Multi-select and nested grouping
- Copy, flip and rotate shapes and groups
- Save groups and projects to the custom shape pack
- Fill, stroke, and shadow options
- Convert strokes to fills
- Intelligent snapping system for easy shape placement
- 21 themed shape packs with over 1,000 shapes
- Over 250 fully finished stickers that can be customized, reused and remixed
- Create and save your own custom stickers
- Share stickers in iMessage
- 35 pre-made color palettes
- Create and save your own custom color palettes
- Eyedropper color sampling tool
- Optional use of color or photo backgrounds
- Save as transparent PNG
- Assembly project file output
- Sync projects across devices with iCloud

= = = = =

ASSEMBLY PRO

Assembly Pro is an auto-renewing subscription service that provides professional features to elevate your work to the next level. 

You can get Assembly Pro for free for 7-days with a free trial. After the free trial you will be automatically renewed to the weekly subscription which you can cancel at any time. The paid subscription costs $2.99 USD per week for the weekly plan, $4.99 USD per month for the monthly plan, and $29.99 USD per year (50% discount off the monthly plan) for the yearly plan. Prices are subject to change. Assembly Pro automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. You may manage Assembly Pro subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a Assembly Pro subscription.

Privacy Policy
http://pixiteapps.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Use
http://pixiteapps.com/terms-of-use/

raw_data.releaseNotes: This update include bug fixes and under-the-hood performance improvements to keep everything fast and responsive.

apps.title: ibis Paint X
apps.description:
ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

*ibisPaint's terms of service
https://ibispaint.com/agreement.jsp

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using ibisPaint X!
The summary of this update is as follows.

[Fixed Bugs and Problems]
- Fixed a bug introduced in the last update where the Color window layout was unintentionally changed on some devices.

[New Features in ver.13.1.1]
- Added a new blending mode "Flat" for brushes, suitable for layering over different colors with either uniform opacity or smoothly graded opacity.

[New Features in ver.13.1.0]
- Added a "Vector Eraser" feature to the Vector tool.
- Added handles to adjust control points in the Bézier Curve drawing tool and “Edit Vertices” mode of brush shapes.
- Added a feature to simplify brush shapes by reducing the number of vertices.
- Added rounded rectangle to the Drawing tool.
- Quick Eyedropper can now be activated with a right-click of the mouse.
- You can now undo and redo parameter changes in the Filter tool.

[New Features in ver.13.0.0]
- Added the Original Brush Pattern feature.
- Added the Surrounding Fill and Surrounding Eraser features. 
- Added the settings parameter “Time for Activation of Quick Eyedropper”.
- Added the Numeric Keypad where you can enter a numeric value for the Brush size or the Canvas size etc.
- Added a stylus shortcut key for the Switch Tool feature.
- Added a selection of the Palm Rejection type for some styluses.
- Added support for the login with an ibisAccount linked to an X/Facebook/Apple account.
- Added support for the hover feature of the Apple Pencil. Added a switch to the Settings which allows you to turn on/off the Show Cross Mark while Hovering.
- Added support for the Barrel Roll feature of the Apple Pencil Pro.
- Added support for the Squeeze feature of the Apple Pencil Pro.

apps.title: Merge Hotel Empire－Design Game
apps.description:
Do you want to help Elsa and work as a designer in our interior design games? Are you a makeover master and can build a house from scratch? Do you enjoy house design and merge games? If your answer is yes, then join Elsa on her journey and play Merge Hotel Empire house design games!

Her whole life, Elsa has been working as a salesperson while cherishing her dream to design, decorate, and open her very own hotel. She made her dream come true on her 30th birthday, when she finally left her job and bought a house in the suburbs to open a small hotel for families.

Elsa found her dream house in a very bad condition. It looks nothing like the photos! Soon enough Elsa realized that the manor she had purchased will require a lot more renovation that she had initially thought. The mansion was far from free and she was greatly deceived with the deal she was offered, but she took it anyway. Perhaps you can turn it into a beautiful designer building together with our heroine!

But the mansion games are not as simple as just decorating houses and taking care of the garden. There is another hotel in town, the owner of which is determined to eliminate all competition. To make it work, Elsa has to take up interior design and home design, renovate every single room, welcome guests and earn enough money to start her own hotel network. Are you up for the challenge?

Another plot twist that Elsa wasn’t ready for is the “curse of hoteliers” that hangs over the city for many years. Nobody’s decor skills have been able to lift it, so Elsa will be the next one to try. Only she can unravel the tangle of intrigues and bring the hotel to prosperity! Put your seatbelt on and prepare for a ride with our merge and home design games!

“My home needs help!”, Elsa thinks. Together, you can match and merge objects to create valuable tools that will help you. Merge Hotel Empire decorating games offer an opportunity to relax and submerge yourself in the exciting world of hospitality. If you enjoy design home and makeover games, you will definitely enjoy Merge Hotel Empire. Help make Elsa’s dream come true.

The mystery mansion is not as sweet and fun as it seems. There is some dark magic going on in the villa and you need to solve this puzzle. Flip the story upside down, escape your evil competitors, and decorate room after room in our merge game. Your designing contribution to the house games matters!

raw_data.releaseNotes: Fixes of critical errors, minor bugfixes, improved overall stability

apps.title: Sweet Home : Design & Blast
apps.description:
Sweet Home : Design & Blast is an addictive block game that’ll keep you entertained for hours!

Match colorful blocks to collect various props and reach your missions.
If you need a little help, use a special item!
And decorate people's homes with mission rewards and enjoy a sweet life.
Are you ready to play?

HOW TO PLAY
• Tap on 2+ adjacent blocks of the same color.
• Match the blocks in fewer moves to reward higher!
• Reach your goal by matching every block carefully!

FEATURES
•Exciting boosters & special items!
•Daily rewards!
•500+ unique levels full of props!
•No Wifi? Match blocks offline!

NOTES
• Sweet Home : Design & Blast contains video ads.
• Sweet Home : Design & Blast is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like hearts and jewels.
• Explore Sweet Home : Design & Blast on mobile or tablet!

E-MAIL
contactus@puzzle1studio.com

PRIVACY POLICY
https://www.puzzle1studio.com/privacy-policy/

Get ready to match the blocks with various props!

Have Fun & Enjoy!

apps.title: Snaptee｜Print,Design,Clothing
apps.description:
Snap your masterpiece and we print & ship it as your personalized tshirt! Snaptee is the first mobile app in the world that enables you to create your own custom T-shirts with just a few taps of your smartphone. Regardless of your design or photo editing experience, you can easily create your unique clothing with our fun tools. Join the creative Snaptee community, DESIGN, SHOP, and even SELL your unique designer clothing completely in-app. 

With Snaptee App, you’ll be able to easily:
- Turn inspiring quote or fun pun into a T-shirt.
- Design the most lovable T-shirt gift for your lover.
- Transcend your Instagram ready photos into a wearable T-shirt.
- Scan your hand-drawn illustrations into a one-of-a-kind T-shirt.
- Building a Team? Wear Logo T-shirts to cheer up your team's spirit!
Follow your imaginations and there is no limit of how you create the most unique and stunning apparels! 

Whether you're a professional photographer or just a photography enthusiast, you can always import photos directly from your mobile device to create new unique Tshirt designs. (For Optimal printing result, in addition to the Photo album's default editing tools, we recommend to use apps like Prisma, VSCO, Lightroom, Snapseed etc. which can allow full resolution export.) Speak your mind. Show off your artistic sense. Support a cause. Get people thinking. Bring a smile to someone’s face with a funny quote. And tell someone you love them in the most dynamic way. 

Snaptee is filled with awesome features: Photo album and Instagram integration; Font editing, colors tools; Custom filters such as glitch, Hare, Noir etc. ; Various Tshirt Style templates are just taps away to inspire your creativity. The innovative Remix button is also great for collaborations. Unlock your design to the Snaptee community and be amazed at how users from all over the world can be inspired by your art and reinterpret your creation in awe! 

Think other people will love your T-shirt as much as you do? Once you finished designing your unique and personalized T-shirt, easily share your design with friends over social media such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc. to get your fans follow you in Snaptee. Make sure to turn on the Publish and Sell button after finishing your design so fans can buy it. For every T-shirt sold, you earn a 10% commission on the sale. 

For the street style hipsters, wear your custom t-shirt and take a selfie and post your impressive shots to your stylebook and lookbook. Build your fan base by showing your style and invite them to follow your Snaptee account. Remember to hashtag #Snaptee when you post on social media!

－－－－－－－

Before Snaptee, making your own T-shirt was such a hassle. Now, there would be: 

- No more searching for an affordable graphic designer.
- No more looking for a print shop that’s willing to make you just one T-shirt.
- No more crowdsourcing, crowdfunding, or crowd-voting other people’s designs.
- No more settling for T-shirts that aren't good enough.
With Snaptee, you can painlessly create the T-shirt that truly represents you.

Your Snaptee masterpiece starts with just US$19.82 plus worldwide shipping. All virtual designs are brought to life one at a time through Snaptee’s efficient digital printing process and shipped directly to you, no matter where you are in the world.  
Snaptee is available as Tank Top, Crew T-shirts, V-neck T-shirts, Hoodies, Sweatshirts and Zipup Parka in your choice of Black, White and many more colors, sized to fit Men, Women, and Kids. 

Realize your creativity now!

apps.title: Hotel Frenzy: Design Makeover
apps.description:
Welcome to the Hotel Empire! Different doorman and waitress stories are staged here everyday! Are you ready for it?

Do you want to be a successful Hotel Empire Tycoon? The most real hotel scene, the most fashion home design and the most delicious food will make you feel the hottest hotel mania and cooking fever! From small hotels to luxury hotels, fast food to top food, open your hotels all around the world and write your hotel story&cooking diary! Thousands of crazy customer dash into your hotel and you need to manage your doorman and waitress to serve them! 

People love vacation and Hotel is one of the important parts of the vacation. Tired traveler want to enjoy the best serve in the hotel which like family hotel. You need to satisfy all their needs on time! Arrange them to check in and check out, cook food like a crazy chef, prepare their daily necessities and help them call the taxi for leaving! The doorman and waitress will receive the likes and appreciation from the guests. And you will get more money and reputation which helps you to be the Hotel Empire Tycoon!

Different with traditional Hotel games, Hotel frenzy can do the home renovation by yourself! If you're a super fun of home design game, you must play hotel frenzy too! The perfect combination of time-management games and house design games, Hotel Frenzy will bring you double surprise and happiness!

Features:
-Open your Hotel all around the world!
-Every map has too many levels to beat and you'll never be bored!
-Satisfy all needs of your guests and make them happy!
-Different types of rooms are waiting for you to decorate!
-Hundreds of furniture are combined to create the most fashionable decoration style!
-Cook yummy food and feel the cooking frenzy!
-Rich rewards and interesting events are waiting for you!

Use your management talent to build the most successful Hotel Empire! Use your design talent to decorate the most unique room! Use your cooking talent be the most crazy chef! It's time to show yourself! Download Hotel Frenzy now!
