apps.title: PicMonkey Photo + Video Design
apps.description:
PicMonkey is a photo editor, design maker, sticker maker, collage maker, ad maker, and background eraser, all rolled into one.  

CREATE STUNNING DESIGNS
• Make a photo into a design or start with a blank canvas and add graphics and text to it.
• Make Facebook post designs, ads, banners, quote posts, flyers, collages 
• Draw, erase, and adjust transparency on everything, including graphic stickers (overlays)
• Add your own photos or graphics to a background. When you add your logo, it keeps its transparency
• Tons of graphics to choose from, and fonts galore.

EDIT YOUR PHOTOS
• Elevate your photos with classic photo editor effects like B&W, Orton, Pixelate, Soften.
• Juice the color with photo filters like ColorAmp, Tint, Ombre.
• Get oldie looks with effects like Instafilm, Seventies, Light Leaks.
• New effects are added all the time! You can paint them onto a specific area or apply them to the whole image.
• Use our background eraser to instantly remove pixels around a photo subject.
• Have fun doodling over your photos with Draw.
• Crop photos and resize them—we have all the sizes.
 
STICKER MAKER/BACKGROUND ERASER
Work wonders with our insanely easy Background Remover—one tap and the pixels around your photo subject are GONE. Use it for product shots or to put people in front of different backgrounds. And you can make stickers with it, too.

ADD TEXT TO PHOTOS
• Add curved text and drop shadows, and adjust them to perfection 
• Adjust letter spacing and line height
• Tons of fonts to choose from
• Match any color in your design or photo with the eyedropper tool
• Get an exact color using hex code, RGB code, or the color wheel

TOUCH UP YOUR PORTRAITS
Touch up photos on the quick with the Presto automatic adjustment or use our other tools to adjust complexions, fix blemishes, create dramatic contours, and brighten eyes and teeth (in-app purchase).
 
BLOW UP YOUR SOCIAL CHANNELS
• Create social posts by starting with a blank canvas or a photo. We have all the sizes—YouTube, Pinterest, Facebook, Instagram, • and more.• 
• Design banners and cover images, edit profile pics, and ads for social.
• Share directly to Instagram; choose Story or post.

MAKE GORGEOUS COLLAGES
Start with a colored background and add your own photos as graphic stickers. Make 'em grid-like or go free-form. Add text and graphic flourishes.  
 
BOOST YOUR BIZNAZZ 
Create banners, profile images, and store icons. 
Make product shots perfect with our background eraser tool —no need to use expensive photo setups. We've got all the Etsy sizes and it's easy to crop for the other online shops.  


WHAT OUR USERS ARE SAYING:
"So easy! I have zero professional background but I love to create. This just makes it so so easy. The app and online editor work so well together. I would highly recommend! "—LizS42


CONTACT US: FOLLOW, LIKE, SHARE
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PicMonkey-363288993696707/
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/PicMonkeyapp

LEGAL SCHTUFF
Our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:
https://www.picmonkey.com/legal 


SUBSCRIPTIONS
Touch Up is free if you have a Basic or Pro subscription. Just log in, via the gear icon in the upper left corner of the app. Or you can buy it as a one-time purchase in-app.

- *Basic/Monthly* — Adds 1 GB of storage for images and full access on Desktop. Auto-renews monthly.
- *Basic/Annual* — Adds 1GB of storage for  images and full access on Desktop. Auto-renews annually.
- *Pro/Monthly* — Adds unlimited image storage, full access on Desktop. Auto-renews annually.
- *Pro/Annual* — Adds unlimited image storage, and full access on Desktop. Auto-renews annually.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless you turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. You can manage your subscription any time from your iTunes account settings—this includes renewal options and cancellations.

raw_data.releaseNotes: This update brings performance and stability improvements along with essential bug fixes for a smoother user experience.

apps.title: My Home Design Story
apps.description:
Romance? Decorate? Puzzles? YES! My Home Design Story : Episode Choices is all this and so much more. Renovate the garden and solve challenging puzzles with this new relaxing and romantic FREE match-3 blast game!

Help Donna renovate her home to its former glory and match blocks to solve challenging blast puzzles. Dig into a romantic love story full of twists and turns as Donna interacts with a cast of colorful characters. Match blocks & start your home makeover – play with themed boosters & renovate the areas with dozens of customizations options!

Discover hidden episodes and choose among hundreds of furnitures for your decoration project! Sit down, relax and enjoy this puzzle game enriched with a beautiful romantic story! Start your makeover now!

Features:
- RENOVATE, decorate and expand your garden with unique locations that tie into the story!
- MATCH blocks and solve hundreds of addictive blast puzzle levels!
- ENJOY plot twists in the story and uncover hidden secrets and mysteries along the way!
- EXPLORE the episodes with its hidden objects, dozens of furnitures and unlock hidden episodes
- RELAX and live a romantic story with funny and heartfelt dialogue!

Solve challenging blast puzzles to uncover Donna’s story, unlock hidden episodes and decorate the home. Relax, sit down, and enjoy this romantic story!

My Home Design Story : Episode Choices is ready for its makeover! Are you ready to decorate and renovate this beautiful home?

My Home Design Story : Episode Choices will be updated with more blast puzzles to solve and more romantic chapters regularly! Already played and enjoyed the game? Stay tuned for updates and drop us a review!

apps.title: Design & Fonts for Cut Machine
apps.description:
Get ready to unleash your inner crafter with the Design & Fonts for Cut Machine app! Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, our app has everything you need to bring your DIY projects to life. From t-shirt designs to home decor projects, our user-friendly platform and extensive selection of features and tools make it easy to create personalized and unique designs that reflect your individual style.

Highlights:
20,000+ Pre-Made SVG Designs
2,000+ Sublimations
4,000+ Watercolor Images
4,000+ Shapes
1,000+ Fonts
2,000+ Monograms
More than 5,000 Stickers
Professional Design Tools (Edit, Rotate, Color, Size, etc)
Save designs and easily print them


With the Design & Fonts for Cut Machine app, you can not only create unique crafting designs but also save them for future use. Whether you're designing a t-shirt, a mug, or any other physical goods, the app makes it simple to print your designs and bring them to life. So why wait? apps.description:
Ignite your creative potential with Picsart — the all-in-one, AI-powered design studio that’s free and easy to use. From pro-quality business designs to next-gen AI art, Picsart is the perfect companion for any creative project that lets you go from inspiration to creation in a flash. Easily switch scenes with Background Remover, finesse your photos & videos with effects, filters, and powerful photo & video editor tools, create inspiring mood boards with photo collages, and more with a full suite of intuitive graphic design tools.

Transform designs with Background Remover tools

apps.title: Solitaire Home Design-Fun Game
apps.description:
Solitaire Home Design, a new free-to-play challenging puzzle game, has finally arrived! Eddie and Lori are the protagonists of this new game. In this game, the two will transform and renovate an entire island with many amazing stories being told. At the same time, you can enjoy a classic card game, exercise your brain and become smarter.

Game features：
-Build and Renovate: Create the island of your dream!
-Classic Card Game: Kill the boring time while keeping your mind sharp!
-Interesting Stories: With a unique and fun storyline, this game will keep you interested in the long and short term.
-Dress Ups: The characters no longer need to wear the same boring outfits, mix and match the way you want!
-Cute Pets: Whether you like dogs or cats, this game has all the cute pets you love!

Lori and Eddie meets in a villa on Solitaire Home Design. Being two complete strangers, why did they decide to live together? And Why did they start renovating the island? And what happens to their relationship over time? The answers are waiting for you in Solitaire Home Design. So download the game and enjoy!

Solitaire Home Design is a free-to-play game with in-app purchases for a more exciting experience. We hope the items you purchased can help you in the most crucial time!

We love to hear your feedbacks or suggestions, so please send them to our email at the following
Email：dreamislandoffical@gmail.com

Or follow our Facebook page to share your experiences with Solitaire Home Design
https://www.facebook.com/disolitaire/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
New Version 1.0.23
1.	New Merge Season feature is here: Complete tasks and unlock exclusive rewards!
2.	New Domino Gameplay added: Take on this exciting challenge!
3.	Event optimizations for a smoother experience.
Make sure to update your game to join the new challenges! And don't forget to participate in our Facebook community event for more exciting content!

apps.title: AI Design Creator & Font Space
apps.description:
Create stunning sublimation logos, stickers, SVG cut files, and more — powered by AI and packed with designer tools!

Unleash your creativity with our all-in-one design app built for crafters, creators, and small business owners. Whether you're making custom merch, personalized gifts, or print-on-demand products, our app gives you everything you need — fast, easy, and professional.

 Features:

- AI-Powered Design Generator
   Instantly generate high-quality sublimation logos and stickers with the help of smart AI — now enhanced for even better results!

- Ready-to-Use Templates
   Access a growing library of professionally designed SVG cut files, sublimations, sticker templates, and more. Perfect for Cricut, Silhouette, and print work.

- Stylish Monograms
   Create elegant monogram designs with our newly added styles – ideal for personal branding, gifts, and decor.

- Premium Designer Fonts
   Choose from a curated collection of unique, modern, and stylish fonts to make your designs stand out.

- Easy to Customize
   Edit, resize, and personalize any design with just a few taps. No design skills needed!

- Bug-Free & Fast
Enjoy a smooth, stable experience with ongoing performance improvements and bug fixes.

Whether you’re a DIY enthusiast, a professional designer, or just starting your creative journey — this app makes designing fun, fast, and flexible.

 Download now and start creating today!

apps.title: Cozy Room Ideas Design Hub+
apps.description:
Cozy Room Ideas Design Hub+ brings you a curated collection of the most beautiful To ca style room designs in stunning HD quality. Explore endless cozy, aesthetic, and creative room ideas to spark your imagination and inspire your next creation.

Whether you love modern mansions, pastel bedrooms, cute kitchens, or aesthetic living spaces, you’ll find unique and stylish inspirations carefully selected for Toca design fans. Each idea is crafted to help you imagine and create your own cozy dream home.

What You’ll Discover:

- A large library of room ideas in HD
- Daily inspiration for cozy, kawaii, and modern designs
- Easy browsing with a smooth and friendly interface
- Option to save and share your favorite ideas instantly
- Regularly updated with new aesthetic and creative concepts

Designed for those who adore To caBoca creativity, interior inspiration, and relaxing, feel-good visuals. Cozy Rooms Ideas Design Hub+ is the perfect source to find ideas that make your digital world brighter and cozier every day.

Why You’ll Love It:
Simple, fast, and full of creative inspiration, this app helps you discover charming design ideas for every mood and space.

Feedback:
If you enjoy the app, please support us with a kind review. For any suggestions or image-related concerns, feel free to contact us we’re happy to help.

Disclaimer:
All images in this app are sourced from public domains and belong to their respective owners. No copyright infringement is intended, and any request for removal will be promptly handled.

apps.title: MyHome Design Hotel Renovation
apps.description:
Do you ever dream of living in a luxury hotel? Tired of only seeing beautiful interiors and home design inspiration on Pinterest, Instagram and co.? Do your own thing and prove your interior designer skills by choosing a magnificent sofa, the trendiest table, the most amazing carpet and create your perfect luxury interior!

Solve cute and colorful match 3 puzzles to earn money and design and decorate different hotels. Select furniture, mix and match or color-code the room to create unique, beautiful and totally insta-worthy home design rooms and places!

If you love makeover, redecor, home design and interior design games then Hotel Renovation is for you! Be inspired by contemporary and modern designs like you have seen on Pinterest and Instagram.

Here's how to create your own Hotel Renovation:
Meet fun and extraordinary clients and design breathtakingly beautiful places!

Design, renovate, remodel! Choose furniture and decor according to your style and preferences!

Exciting and addictive Match-3 puzzle games! Play puzzles to collect coins and use them to create your perfect design!

Express yourself and nurture your interior design skills! Plus, find inspiration for your own insta-worthy home makeover!

Play for free and offline!

New episodes and match-3 puzzle levels released regularly!



Make your home design dreams come true in Hotel Renovation.



*Please note that [ Hotel Renovation ] saves your progress on your device. Data will be reset if you delete the app or change your device.*

------------------------------------------------

DEVELOPER INFO

 Are you into home design? Puzzle games? CookApps Playgrounds fan?

For news, giveaways and fun join our Facebook community on:

https://www.facebook.com/PlaygroundsTeam/

apps.title: VistaCreate: Graphic Design
apps.description:
Perfect your graphic design, logo, and template projects — everything you need to create stunning visuals is in one place. VistaCreate (ex Crello) is a free graphic design platform with thousands of templates, logo makers, and editing features to help you customize your projects. Remove backgrounds, access a huge library of fonts, illustrations, stickers, and effortlessly create professional designs for free.

Our app offers all the tools you need for graphic design, whether you’re creating a logo, social media post, or business template. With VistaCreate (ex Crello), you can bring your creative ideas to life in minutes. Utilize intuitive design tools and pre-built templates to enhance your brand with impactful visuals — ideal for any graphic design, logo, or template endeavor.

VISTACREATE FEATURES:
- 200,000+ professionally designed templates
- 80+ digital and print design formats
- 85,000+ stickers, shapes, illustrations
- 15,000+ animated templates
- 1M+ free premium images
- 760+ free fonts for your text
- 17,000+ animations for any creative idea

DESIGN FORMATS FOR ANY BUSINESS NEED
 Create anything from a printed flyer to a custom logo or digital graphic design project in VistaCreate. Choose from more than 20 design formats in the app. Pick the right template, easily customize it, and impress audiences with your studio-level designs.

FREE AND EASY-TO-USE EDITING FEATURES
 Remove any image background with a single click. Easily resize, crop, or customize your images with thousands of design objects. Whether you’re creating a graphic design, logo, or template, the opportunities are limitless — plus, the app is totally free to download and use.


USE READY-MADE TEMPLATES
 Explore thousands of professionally-made templates for any occasion in VistaCreate. Choose any pre-made design and easily customize it to fit your style. Change the background, upload your own image, play with fonts, and create custom visuals for your needs without a designer.Designed to support all your graphic design, logo, and template tasks.

ACCESS A HUGE LIBRARY OF OBJECTS
 Check out a vast collection of design objects in VistaCreate. Enhance your designs with thousands of free stickers, illustrations, icons, and more. Plus, browse hundreds of fonts to pick the perfect text style for your graphic design, logo, or template.

RESIZE OR CROP YOUR IMAGE
 Crop your pictures, leaving in the most important parts of your design. With VistaCreate, it’s easy to resize your designs — switch between formats in a click and upload it to different platforms: social media, email newsletters, blog posts, and more. It’s perfect for adapting any graphic design, logo, or template for various channels.

ADD SOUND TO YOUR VISUALS
 Explore our collection of licensed tracks and add the right music to your image or video. You can also upload your own music for a personal touch. Find the perfect soundtrack for any mood and elevate your graphic design, logo, or template projects.

DOWNLOAD AND SHARE
 Download your designs in one click, or share them directly to Instagram, Facebook, or other platforms right from the app. Save your projects in PNG or JPG and maintain high-quality visuals with our graphic design tools, whether working on a logo, template, or other creative content.

CREATE TOP VIDEO CONTENT
 Enhance your feed with unique video content! Explore our library of animations and videos to choose the best one for your creative idea. Tap to add a video, and it will immediately be part of your design, ideal for any graphic design, logo, or template work.

We’re constantly adding new templates, logos, and premium media to help you create standout visuals for your business. Stay trendy with VistaCreate — your all-in-one solution for graphic design, logo, template creation and so much more!

https://create.vista.com/faq/legal/privacy_policy/privacy_policy/
https://create.vista.com/faq/legal/terms_of_use/terms_of_use/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Fresh templates and app improvements in this release

We’re working on delivering the best experience in the app for you, and meanwhile, we encourage you to leave feedback and reviews in the AppStore. Tell us about your favorite thing in VistaCreate editor – what feature do you find the coolest? Let’s make it official, you and VistaCreate!

apps.title: Deco Neko - Cat Room Design
apps.description:
Did you know cats reduce anxiety?
Sit back and relax as you build the perfect house for your cats in this cute game for cat lovers of all ages. 
 
Decorate your cats room, dress them up with costumes, and spoil them with treats! Deco Neko is a cute offline cat game for cat moms and cat dads. Enjoy adorable pixel art in this cartoon cat simulator. Use your interior design and remodelling skills to give your cats the ultimate "pawsh" lifestyle!

Deco Neko is a simple and easy game to pick up at any time and play as you commute, work, wait, or for when you just need to unwind and decompress with cute cats. The relaxing ASMR sounds and visuals will relieve stress and anxiety and help you feel relaxed and happy!

DECORATE: Design and decorate your cat's space with a variety of furniture and decor. Enrich your cat's space with plants and art or roll on high quality wallpaper to really spruce up the interior design! The more you decorate, the happier your cats!

DRESS UP: Shop for costumes and accessories to dress up your cats! Try on a bow if your kitty is feeling dapper, or a bunny hat when your cat is feeling silly!

TREATS: These kitties have a sweet tooth! Satisfy their cravings with cat-safe treats like Kittyberry Cake or Kittymisu! Cakes give your cats a pick-me-up with big rewards!

UNLOCK CATS: Feline lucky? Make a wish for a chance to unlock more cats. There are so many cats to discover! Each cat has a unique look and personality and their own space to decorate!

ACHIEVEMENTS: Complete daily and weekly achievements for rewards. Use rewards to unlock more content and buy fancier cat items!

SHARE YOUR CREATIVITY: Share your room on social media and show off your interior design skills!

PLAY FOR FREE AND OFFLINE!

If you love cats, wish you had a cat, or have a and are a cat mom or cat dad and want a relaxing game full of cute cats, you'll love Deco Neko! If you enjoy decorating, interior design, home remodelling, tycoon games, clicker games, simulators, or relaxing casual games like Animal Crossing, Stardew Valley, Cats & Soup, and other pocket camp games, you'll love Deco Neko! If you enjoy relaxing, meditation, decompressing, finding ways to reduce anxiety and depression, and love cute games with adorable art, you guessed it - you'll love Deco Neko!

Deco Neko offers in-app purchases and ads to make it easier to acquire premium items. Players who do not make in-app purchases won't miss out on any content as in-game coins and points can be exchanged for premium content!

---

About Flying Bunny Studios
We are a small team of 2. Our passion is to create cute and relaxing feel-good games for everybody to enjoy. We create all of our art and music and write all our code.

We appreciate you for supporting us and sharing Deco Neko with your friends and loved ones!

If you wish to contact us, please email us directly at support@flyingbunnystudios.ca

apps.title: Mergedom: Home Design & Merge
apps.description:
Do you see yourself as the best designer ever? It’s time to find out and play your favorite genre — home decoration and design! Mergedom Home Design combines elements of merge puzzle and decoration games. Unlike other merge games, this one gives you its unique design options and complete control over the creative process of decoration and renovation. Bring your expert eye and show off your skills while playing Mergedom: Home Design!

Meet your customers, deliver their orders, and explore new tools as you merge! Start from a hall and build a lovely house from scratch or give a home a complete makeover while playing this merge game.

While playing Mergedom: Home Design, you will taste its features.

MERGE and CREATE NEW TOOLS
Merge your items into new tools. There are numerous combinations you can explore! 

DISCOVER HIDDEN ITEMS
Your game board has full of surprises and unique items! Discover new and valuable tools by merging your items.

POWER-UP WITH THE EXCITING BOOSTERS 
Strengthen your merging skills with the exciting power-ups, use their advantages, and progress faster. 

GIVE YOUR HOME A TOTAL MAKEOVER 
Renovate and design the rooms and give them back their glory! As soon as you finish an area, you can open up a new one.  

JOIN THE TOURNAMENTS AND EVENTS 
Challenge other mergers, join the tournaments and events. Collect points, earn rewards, and be the #1 merger!

Download now and play it anytime and anywhere! 

Mergedom: Home Design is FREE TO PLAY, and you can play the game while you are OFFLINE.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’ve been busy behind the scenes to improve your game experience!

Bug fixes to keep things running smoothly.
Performance improvements for faster and more seamless gameplay.

Thanks for playing! Stay tuned for more fun updates soon!

apps.title: Fashion Design Sketch Tools
apps.description:
Step into the glamorous world of fashion design with  Fashion Maker, the mobile application that transforms your creative dreams into runway-worthy reality. Immerse yourself in a world of limitless style possibilities with our feature-packed platform, designed for fashionistas, artists, and visionaries alike.
Embark on Your Fashion Journey with These Exciting Features:
Model Templates: Dive right into the world of haute couture with a stunning array of model templates. From sassy catwalk struts to elegant red carpet poses, find the perfect muse for your creations.
Clothing Templates: Explore an opulent wardrobe of clothing templates that span the fashion spectrum, from haute elegance to street chic. Elevate your designs with the finest cuts, fabrics, and silhouettes, each one handpicked for your imagination.
Texture Brushes: Paint fashion to life with an awe-inspiring array of texture brushes. Whether it's the luxurious sheen of satin, the intricate weave of tweed, or the delicate lacework of evening gowns, every stroke tells a story.
Color Palette: Conjure your fashion vision with a mesmerizing spectrum of colors at your fingertips. Craft palettes that mirror your mood, or tap into our curated collections inspired by the latest trends and timeless classics.
Layering and Undo/Redo: Craft perfection layer by layer. Our intuitive interface empowers you with unlimited layers, ensuring that every detail is honed to precision. Fear not the eraser; unlimited undo and redo are your guiding stars.
Accessories Galore: Complete your ensembles with a treasure trove of accessories. From statement jewelry to finely crafted footwear, every detail counts in the world of fashion.
Export and Share: Turn your sketches into digital haute couture. Export your masterpieces in high-resolution glory, ready to dazzle your social media followers, adorn your portfolio, or grace the pages of your digital fashion diary.
In-App Tutorials: Elevate your skills with a collection of in-app tutorials and expert tips. Let seasoned fashion gurus guide you in unlocking the secrets of the catwalk.
Offline Mode: Create anywhere, anytime, even when the world sleeps. No need to wait for inspiration – let it flow freely, online or offline.
Why Fashion Maker?
FashionSketch Pro isn't just an app; it's your personal atelier, your canvas, and your passport to the world of high fashion. Whether you're a budding fashionista, a seasoned designer, or simply someone who dreams in textures and colors, our app empowers you to craft, create, and conquer the runway with your unique style.
The world of fashion is at your fingertips. Download  Fashion Maker today and transform your imagination into fashion magic that's bound to captivate the world. It's more than an app; it's your ticket to the forefront of style innovation. Elevate your sketches, and let your fashion fantasies flourish like never before.

Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1h-whE7OZv_KvdSKcskG0B_IMqNSt01aS0_PpeyMqGm4/edit?usp=sharing
Terms of Use: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Tyyn09PrK5RNt55IP1Fd0pw_B1yNuRNDgIxxs_ZJasc/edit?usp=sharing

apps.title: Meme Maker Pro: Meme Editor
apps.description:
Meme Maker Pro – The Ultimate Meme Editor & Creator!
Instantly create viral memes, animated GIFs, and stunning collages with our easy-to-use design tools.

Angry Cat? Bad Luck Brian? Drake? ~One does not simply~ say it quite like a meme. Create your own with Meme Maker Pro – the fastest and most intuitive meme and graphic design app you’ll ever use.

No graphic design skills required – easily create static and video memes using the hottest and most popular meme templates! Add text to photos and videos, create collages, and browse 1000’s of stickers, fonts, emojis, and more to make your designs pop!

All-in-one image design tools mean there’s no limit to your creative vision! One-tap background removal, pre-designed templates, and custom text features make it easy to make your memes (and beyond) completely your own!

As an added bonus, we don’t just start and stop with memes – Meme Maker Pro is also a video and image editor! Create your very own GIFs, logos, social media stories and even posters and invitations in a snap! It’s your one-stop shop for all things graphic design – without the complication. With just a few simple taps, your creations come to life! 

With millions of ways to design your very own memes, graphics, and video meme layouts, the possibilities are limitless. Browse 1000’s of trending templates, meme styles and graphic design art and make your posts stand out!

KEEP CALM and MEME ON with Meme Maker Pro – the ultimate meme maker! Design your memes and rule the internet today!

MEME MAKER PRO FEATURES

MEME DESIGNER – MAKE MEMES, GIFS & MORE EASILY
- Create memes from dozens of today’s most popular, trending templates
- Customize your meme layouts for unlimited ways to express your meme genius
- Add top and bottom text to your memes for that classic meme look in a snap!
- Cats, stock images, Drake – find the hottest meme templates perfect for any situation
- GIF galore! Add text and graphics to video memes and Tenor GIFs easily with just a few taps

ALL-IN-ONE GRAPHIC DESIGN & MEME TOOL
- One-tap background eraser makes it easy to edit your own photos into designs
- Browse through 1000’s of meme stickers, design elements and more!
- Add custom text to your designs or use our text bubbles to create your own meme watermark!
- More than memes! Create collages, posters, invitations, photo grids and more in a snap!

EASY TO USE, EASY TO SHARE
- Design your own meme, video meme, GIF, and more and easily save or export them right from the app!
- Say goodbye to complicated design tools! Make memes and designs on the go!
- Our simple interface makes it easy to create your own memes and designs exactly how you want!
- Share your designs on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok & more!

Want even more meme magic? Start your free, 7-day trial today, unlock everything, remove the ads with a Meme Maker Pro subscription:

- Unlock all Meme Layouts, Templates and Images
- A.I. powered Background Remover
- A.I. powered Magic Image Maker
- No ads
- 367 Fonts
- 10,000+ Stickers & sticker search tools
- 2.6 million free stock images

Meme Maker Pro Annual - $59.99 USD/year (That's only $4.99/month)
Meme Maker Pro Monthly - $9.99 USD/month

- 7-day free trial
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable


Terms of use: https://www.pizap.com/privacypolicy
Privacy Policy: https://www.pizap.com/privacypolicy

apps.title: Widget+ Custom HomeScreen
apps.description:
Tired of traditional screen layout? 

Widget+ makes it easy to create your own home screen! Customize your home screen with widgets, icons and wallpapers!  Just follow the instructions step-by-step, say goodbye to boring screen!

*COLORFUL WIDGETS*
Widget+ offers you tons of styles, landscape, universe, cartoon, neon,… If you want to design yourself, you can change font, text color or background picture.

*THEMES & ICONS*
Every theme contains wallpapers, widgets and icons, different theme styles such as Forest, Neon, Black, etc. Choose the one you like, they’re easy to apply with the help of our guide. 

*TIME & DATE*
Choose a beautiful clock or date, get clear information than before, every calendar widget has 3 sizes for you to choose, some of them display the better yet.

*PHOTO & MOTIVATION*
If you like sharing photo or powerful quotes, come to add photo or motivation widgets. Decorate your home screen with your family, friends and pets photo, or just something beautiful.

Attention:
 - Our app is available on iOS 14 and later.
 - The icon skin do not change the actual app icons, these icons are just a custom shortcut using Shortcuts App.

apps.title: Playground: AI Design & Editor
apps.description:
Playground is the world’s easiest way to design anything with the power of AI. Start from hundreds of pre-designed templates and dozens of different styles that allow for infinite editing and variations until you get just what you were looking for – or maybe even better. 
 
From sticker and t-shirt designs to social media posts, mobile wallpaper, and even memes, this Canva alternative is like your very own, always available graphic designer. 

STUNNING AI TEMPLATES:
No more “blank page”: start designing fast with hundreds of highly customizable templates that become unique designs in seconds with our AI tools
Quickly generate professional designs for all areas of your business and hobbies, from logos and social media posts to stickers, signs, t-shirts, mockups, and more – you can even make custom memes!
Remix your images with one of dozens of styles for a totally different vibe and aesthetic at the tap of a button
Edit any image by just asking Playground to make a change, like adding text or changing the subject – Playground can make infinite revisions until you’re satisfied 
Resize any image, and Playground’s AI design tools will magically adjust the composition on your behalf, including placement of text

CHANGE ANYTHING WITH AI
Design anything, anywhere, in a few seconds. Just pick a template and maybe a style, and tell Playground what you want to change: “Make the cat into a dog”, “Add the text, ‘Happy birthday, Henry!’ at the top”, “What if the scene were Halloween-themed?” And make as many edits or revisions as you like – our AI design tools can handle it all. The possibilities are literally as limitless as your imagination. 

When you’re satisfied with your design, add final finishing touches, like “remove background” and “upscale”, before exporting it to wherever it needs to go. 

No annoying ads to watch, no confusing settings to mess with, no steep learning curve on design skills – just a clean and easy way to make your creativity and ideas into a reality with just a few words.

DESIGNS FOR EVERY CATEGORY
With dozens of new templates being added across 10+ categories every day, you’ll never lack for inspiration. Here are some amazing things you can design, with no prior design skills:
Custom logo designs for your business
Stickers, t-shirts, wall art, and other designs for your print-on-demand shop or online business
Personalized memes
Monograms, patterns, and banners for stationery, signage, and other IRL marketing materials
Beautiful artwork for your home, office, or even your phone wallpaper
Social media templates for Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, TikTok
Posters, cards, and banners for events

apps.title: Home Design : Renovate to Rent
apps.description:
Give the old homes a complete makeover and rent it to for top dollar! Live the life of a real estate mogul and interior decorator in this newest home design game. Relax by transforming foreclosed homes, renovating properties, and instead of flipping them, rent it for money-flushed clients. 

Features:

*Unique gameplay: now you got the chance to decorate & renovate without having to play match 3 puzzle game. Focus on home design only.
*Interior design: you decide what the place will look like.
*Variety of rooms: we have prepared tons of visually-stunning three-dimensional spaces for you to design & decorate.
*Aesthetic furniture: all decor items and furniture were inspired by Pinterest, Ashley, and Ikea. Gain inspiration and learn about different interior design styles.
*Creativity boosting: play with home decor styles, express your creativity and improve your design skills.
*Engaging stories: rent houses for clients with unique personalities and learn about their amazing stories.
*Frequent, fresh and free content updates with new interior and exterior design challenges, floor plans, outdoor gardens, landscaping, seasonal items and more!

Home Design: Renovate to Rent is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.
Enjoying Renovate to rent? Join our vibrant home design community on:

*Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PurpleCowStudios/
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/purplecowstudio_cookapps/

apps.title: YOOX
apps.description:
YOOX is the world's leading online lifestyle store: Fashion, Design and Art. Now keep it close at hand with a new app that provides a personalized shopping experience with quicker and easier navigation. Discover new arrivals from the best designers every day.

So many benefits, all in a single app.

• AN AREA BRIMMING WITH INSPIRATION AND NEW ARRIVALS •
Searching for the perfect look?  Head to the inspirational "Y" area to discover our exclusive offers and get style tips from fashion insiders. Every day you can find pieces in the new arrivals area from the most famous designers and the best brands, including a sought-after selection of home design items, books and creations by international artists. 

• MYOOX, YOUR PERSONAL SPACE •
Register or log in to receive all of our updates on new items and promotions in real time, and get a space just for you, where you can see your pending orders and lots more. 

• DREAM BOX, YOUR DREAM ITEMS •
Save all of your most-wanted items to buy later. With the Dream Box, they'll always be in sight and you'll stay up-to-date on their availability. 

• QUICK AND EASY SEARCHES •
Start typing and use our suggestions to find what you're looking for faster. The filters will help you identify what you want from a unique selection of apparel (women's, men's, children's) as well as art and design items.

• QUICK PURCHASING •
If you've already saved a mailing address or card in MYOOX, you'll complete your purchase more quickly and securely.  Once you've received your order, if you are not pleased with what you bought, don't worry: with us, you can always change your mind.

Download the new YOOX app for free.

Please leave a brief review on the App Store, it will only take a minute!

apps.title: Text Art: Typography & Word
apps.description:
Create beautiful and professional posts, flyers, and posters with Text Art! 

With just a few taps, anyone can create eye-catching graphic design. Simply select a photo, enter a catchy caption, and choose between dozens of designer text styles. Every time you select a style, a new, unique design is generated just for you!

Whether you are looking to spice up your social media account or create professional flyers, Text Art is all you need. And if you plan to print your artworks, you'll be happy to learn that Text Art exports in the highest possible resolution.

What you'll get with Text Art:

- Designer-picked fonts and layout combinations
- Beautiful and unique text art generated just for you
- Hundreds of colors, gradients, and textures
- Million of free professional stock photos
- Large database of inspirational quotes
- Exporting in high resolution

-----------------

While Text Art is free to use, premium access to the app (including all premium text styles) requires a paid subscription. Please see the subscriptions details below.

- The subscription is automatically renewed every month or year until cancelled.
- Your payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Apple ID account settings after the purchase.
- Your subscription will renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.

About Subscriptions - http://appostrophe.se/textart/subscriptions.html
Terms of Use - http://appostrophe.se/textart/terms.html
Privacy Policy - http://appostrophe.se/textart/privacy.html

apps.title: Align: The Human Design App
apps.description: The best way for you to create success, joy and ease is not to do what works for other people - it's to understand who you are and do it in the way that's right and aligned for you. The most powerful you can do is become who you came here to be, and unbecome the way you've been taught to be. Human Design is a new science that gives you your unique roadmap to becoming that real version of self and from there, everything flows. There is a reason why following other people's plans and advice doesn't 100% work for you - because you were designed differently than them. This app will give you a full breakdown of your chart, which covers how you're built to manifest, eat, work, your unique gifts and traits, your personality, how you learn, and so much more.

apps.description:
Make beautiful mockups in seconds with our ready-to-use mockup library! Easily drag & drop your design to upload, switch between color options and preview your designs on a 3D high quality product image. Bring your designs to life and post to your social media to boost online business.

In our app, you can easily:
- Turn your creative idea into a 3D T-shirt or any other mockup without complicated skills required.
- Personalize everything: add your favorite mockups, change colors, upload image in a click, automatically save projects, and choose the right export options.
- Create Logo designs easily with our logo templates and symbol stock. Various styles to choose from: Conceptual, Shapes & Lines, Cosmetic, Watercolor, etc.
- Unleash your creativity with an abundant symbol stock of different categories: basics, colorful, avatar, doodle, boho, garland, makeup, rosegold, etc.

•Mockup with our growing templates
We provide free mockups for T-shirts, phone case, wall arts, books, boxes, bags, mugs and bottles, screen displays, etc. Templates are updated weekly and please tell us if you have any special needs.

•T-shirt design maker
Transform your photos into a unique T-shirt. The t shirt design app front and back helps to present your T-shirt designs super effectively. And there is no limit to how you create the most unique clothes! 

•Mug mockup creator
Choose from tons of mug mockup styles featuring diverse models and backgrounds. Visualize your design, in a photorealistic way, with our variety of mug mockup items and templates.

•Great color tool
We provide a color picker and a powerful palette for you to quickly get the color you want.

•Powerful searching feature
Use our searching feature to quickly find the mockup you need. And more and more mockup templates will soon be on the list based on your searching requests.

•Subscription option: $6.99 per month, $18.99 per year. Subscribe for unlimited access to all features and content offered for purchase within the app.

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. apps.title: Logo Maker - Design Creator *
apps.description:
A logo maker lets you design beautiful logos, which are essential for an organization’s identity. Graphic design logo makers offer uniquely designed logo templates that allow you to create your logo.

AI Logo Maker makes it easier for users to design a stunning logo using their iPad, iPhone, or iPod. If you are not a professional logo designer, then don't worry about paying a design fee to professional designers, as our tool can help you for free. You can use the free logo maker to create professional logos, even if you don't have any design skills or experience.

AI Logo Generator provides you with icons and shapes in the form of templates. You can use these templates to create a unique logo for your brand. A logo should always look catchy and should portray the personality of the brand. Our business logo features numerous amazing templates that can be used and customized to create a stunning vector.

With this logo creator, you can design logos in a few minutes. Creating a logo manually with professional design programs requires a significant amount of time and effort. Still, with our app, you can achieve the same high-quality results in just minutes. Our app offers logo design and advanced editing features, allowing you to add layers, branding elements, and filters that will help capture a unique brand value.

Hiring an expert for logo design can be costly and difficult, especially when you don't know what kind of logo would work best for your brand. But you can get as many logos as you want without any hassle. The app not only allows you to make your logo, but it also helps you learn how to create a relevant logo for your brand.

How is our logo maker app better than others?

You might come across dozens of logo creator apps on the store today. Before trying them, read out some of the reasons why our utility is better than any other logo maker:

AI logo generator feature

Designing a professional logo has never been easier with the AI Logo Generator. Whether you're launching a new business, rebranding, or creating a personal project, our powerful AI-driven tool helps you craft a unique and eye-catching logo effortlessly. 

More than 3,000 predesigned templates

Our logo maker app provides not hundreds but thousands of pre-designed templates. These templates are categorized into distinct sections. Our logo template collection is divided into distinct sections related to specific niches. Users need to find the category that matches the nature of their business and select a suitable template from there. Our vintage logo category provides the best old-themed designs.

More than 1000 free design resources

Another notable feature of our app is that it provides thousands of helpful design resources. These resources encompass a wide range of elements, including symbols, icons, shapes, backgrounds, fonts, and more. You can use these resources to edit already-designed templates. You can customize a single template in thousands of different ways with our app.

Easy editing and customization options

Our graphic design logo creator app for iPhone and iPad is popular due to its easy-to-use editing features. You can edit a logo design as many times as you want. The design can be saved in your personal cloud storage space. From there, you can access it on multiple iOS devices and modify the saved template according to your requirements.

Autosave and undo/redo options

Once you select a template from a specific category and move to the editing dashboard, your design will be automatically saved to your device. You don’t have to worry about completing the design in one go. Moreover, our application provides unlimited undo and redo options, allowing users to correct their mistakes.

We offer high-resolution export

Once you make your logo, you can save the logo in PNG, JPEG, SVG, and other HD formats.

Privacy Policy: https://zipoapps.com/ailogomakerios/privacy/ 
Terms and Conditions: https://zipoapps.com/ailogomakerios/terms/

Do you ever dream of living in a luxury house? Tired of only seeing beautiful interiors and home design inspiration on Pinterest, Instagram and co.? Do your own thing and prove your interior designer skills by choosing a magnificent sofa, the trendiest table, the most amazing carpet and create your perfect luxury interior!

Solve cute and colorful match 3 puzzles to earn money and design and decorate different rooms. Select furniture, mix and match or color-code the room to create unique, beautiful and totally insta-worthy home design rooms and places!

If you love makeover, redecor, home design and interior design games then Luxury Interiors is for you! Be inspired by contemporary and modern designs like you have seen on Pinterest and Instagram.

Here's how to create your own Luxury Interiors:

Meet fun and extraordinary clients and design breathtakingly beautiful places!

Design, renovate, remodel kitchens, living rooms, bedrooms, and luxury swimming pools. Choose furniture and decor according to your style and preferences!

Exciting and addictive Match-3 puzzle games! Play puzzles to collect coins and use them to create your perfect home design!

Express yourself and nurture your interior design skills! Plus, find inspiration for your own insta-worthy home makeover!

Play for free and offline!

New episodes and match-3 puzzle levels released regularly!



Make your home design dreams come true in Luxury Interiors.



*Please note that [ Luxury Interiors ] saves your progress on your device. Data will be reset if you delete the app or change your device.*

------------------------------------------------

DEVELOPER INFO

 Are you into home design? Puzzle games? CookApps Playgrounds fan?

For news, giveaways and fun join our Facebook community on:

https://www.facebook.com/PlaygroundsTeam/

apps.title: Tizi Home Design Girl Games
apps.description:
Welcome to Tizi Home Design Girl Games – Create Your Own Dream House!



Step into the exciting game world of creativity, imagination, and fun! In Tizi Home Design, you get the chance to explore, decorate, and build the most beautiful dream house you’ve ever imagined. Whether you love girl games, doll games, or home games, this app is the perfect place to let your imagination run free.



Unleash Your Creativity

Design your very own dream house with stylish furniture, colorful décor, and amazing themes. From bedrooms to living rooms, kitchens to gardens, the choices are endless. This is not just about home design, it’s about creating a world where you can tell your own stories, just like in toca boca world.



Perfect for Games for Girls
Looking for fun and safe games for girls? This app is made just for you! Build, decorate, and roleplay in your own world. With simple controls and endless customization, games for girls have never been this fun. Create your fantasy space, decorate it, and invite your friends into your dream house.



Explore the Game World
Travel through exciting locations inside Tizi’s game world. Unlock new rooms, play interactive mini-games, and enjoy the feeling of living in your very own dream house. Discover how fun world games can be when you’re the one in charge of all the design choices.



Family Fun
Not just for kids, this app brings joy to everyone. If you love family games for kids, Tizi Home Design is a perfect fit. Parents and children can play together, decorate rooms, and create wonderful family stories inside this cozy, playful universe.



Doll Games Meet Home Design
Love doll games? Combine them with home design fun! Dress up characters, create their lifestyle, and place them in different rooms of your dream house. Roleplay with your dolls and watch your imagination come to life.



Why You’ll Love Tizi Home Design Girl Games:
A wide variety of furniture, themes, and styles for endless home design fun.
Exciting games for girls that focus on creativity and imagination.
An open-ended game world similar to toca boca world, where anything is possible.
Family-friendly fun with family games for kids to enjoy together.
Roleplay adventures that mix doll games, home games, and world games all in one.



Whether you dream of a chic apartment, a cozy villa, or a colorful fantasy castle, Tizi Home Design makes it possible. It’s more than just girl games – it’s your own creative playground where every corner tells your story. Download now and start building your dream house today!





Subscription Details:
- Payment will be charged to the Apple Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Cancel subscription renewal anytime under Subscriptions in your App Store Settings.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during an active subscription period.



Privacy Policy: https://www.idzdigital.com/privacypolicy-tizi.php
Terms of service: https://www.idzdigital.com/terms_of_service.php

Need help or have any feedback? Email at support@idzdigital.com

raw_data.releaseNotes: Explore our new home designs! We have added three exciting new scenes: Japanese, Bohemian & Kawaii theme home & room decor. Time to get creative and design your dream space! Please leave a review and rating to help us improve and bring even more fun features to the game.

apps.title: GoDaddy Studio for Business
apps.description:
Graphic design, a domain registrar, social posts and instant videos all-in-one. BOOM! You’re in business with GoDaddy Studio.
 
GoDaddy Studio is designed for the everyday entrepreneur to grow their business while on-the-go. Design a logo, find a domain, create product shots and build your brand with stand-out social posts and engaging videos - all from the palm of your hand.
 
NEW: GRAB A CUSTOM DOMAIN AND CLAIM YOUR PLACE ONLINE  
No domain, no game: Let your customers know where to find you. 
•	Expand your brand’s online presence. 
•	Be more searchable: Increase your brand’s SEO.  
•	Create more credibility for your much-loved brand.  
•	Be secure and accessible from anywhere.   
 
LOGO MAKER 
Need a logo? Get one fast and for free with GoDaddy Studio. You choose:  
•	Create a logo from scratch with easy design tools.  
•	Scroll through hundreds of logo templates and take your pick.  
•	Personalize in minutes and launch your business! 
 
EASY DESIGN TOOLS TO SAVE YOU TIME  
Discover the best design tools at your fingertips, no design-skills needed.  
•	Remove backgrounds from your photos in seconds.  
•	Create snappy videos with our AI-powered Instant Video feature. 
•	Explore thousands of easy-to-customize templates to help you design fast.  
•	Pick from a selection of over 600 fonts, use curved text and more.  
•	Edit your photos. Add text and filters with our easy photo editor.  
•	Create on-trend social posts with graphics and stickers. 
•	Use Layout Collections for speedy content creation.  
•	Resize content to fit Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok and more.
 
FREE AI-POWERED INSTANT VIDEO MAKER 
Get seen on social with instant videos that anyone can create, fast.  
•	Use our AI-powered video maker to get ‘eyes’ on your social content. 
•	A video maker for everyone: No video-editing skills needed.  
•	AI-powered smart text will generate catchy copy to help your videos convert. 
•	Find music for your videos: Fully licensed and good-to-go. 
•	Get noticed on social sites like TikTok and Instagram with custom videos, auto-styled with transitions and music.
 
GROW YOUR BRAND ON SOCIAL 
Stand out on social media with beautiful content that is easy to create. 
•	Need ideas to boost engagement? We’ve got them. 
•	Find free videos to use in our exclusive video library. 
•	Speed up content creation and share branded content every day. 
•	Grow your followers with a consistent brand aesthetic. 
•	Create videos with our powerful AI-powered video creation tool.  
•	Create like-worthy Instagram stories and Instagram reels, TikTok videos, Facebook posts, profile pictures and more.   
•	Find 30-days of Instagram posts  for your business. 
 
CREATE YOUR BRAND AESTHETIC 
Want to look professional on social media, your website, email marketing and more? You can with GoDaddy Studio’s brand kit... 
•	Design your logo 
•	Create your brand color palette 
•	Find your brand fonts 
•	Save your brand kit (logo, colors and fonts) for seamless creation. 
•	Create social posts and branded content to establish a professional brand identity. 
 
FREE LINK IN BIO SITE  
What is a Link in Bio site? It’s the only link you need to organise your online presence - and it’s free with GoDaddy Studio.  
•	Link to everywhere you are online from one central place. 
•	Pick your favorite Link in Bio template and customize it in seconds.  
•	Choose your unique URL and publish your Link in Bio site for free. 
•	Direct your customers to all your top content from your Link in Bio. 
•	Grow your following from one central place.  
 
GoDaddy Studio is all you need to easily design, promote and grow your brand online. 
 
Start creating and watch your business fly.

apps.title: T Shirt Designer Tool App
apps.description:
Create your very own T-shirt, Hoodie,....crafting it to be custom and personalized

T Shirt Designer Tool App is the most trusted mobile app to design premium custom t-shirts, hoodies, leggings and more. Personalize your attire with our custom clothing and T-shirt design services, catering to both men and women.

It's never been this fast or easy to order a high quality custom t-shirt or hoodie from your phone!

Explore our user-friendly features:

- Simply drag and drop photos and images directly onto your shirt.
- Easily upload your designs and save them as drafts for future edits.
- Harness the power of our advanced photo editor to enhance your visuals.
- Infuse your shirt with vitality using unique image effects.
- Craft your text with a diverse array of fonts and colors.
- Choose from a vast collection of over 300 templates.
- Dive into a wide spectrum of shirt colors to complement your style

Payment and subscription condition: 
Subscription auto-renew at the end of subscription period, unless cancelled 24-hours in advance prior to the end of the current period. 
The subscription fee is charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. 
You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. 
Per Apple policy, no cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. 
Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.
You can unsubscribe at any time.

Terms of use: https://sites.google.com/view/t-shirt-designer-tool-app/terms-of-service
Privacy policy: https://sites.google.com/view/t-shirt-designer-tool-app/privacy-policy

apps.title: Design Crasher - HomeDesign 3D
apps.description:
Get ready to be inspired! Create and build beautiful interior designs and see them come to life in 3D. Choose the dimensions of your room and customize everything from home decor to flooring to wall treatments to furniture to accessories and more! When you’re done, share your room designs with other Crashers in the Design Crasher Lounge, accessible within our home and interior design app.

Create – It’s in the name! Create the interior of your dream room or use the dimensions of your existing space to recreate it in 3D design within Design Crasher. Choose from our constantly updated selection of decor, accessories, fixings, and more.

Stuck? Get inspired by Crashing fellow designers in the Design Crasher Lounge and by cloning their designs to add your own personal touches. Don’t forget to check out your space in the 3D viewer mode to bring it to life!

Crash and be crashed. Design Crasher is about community. Find Crashers that inspire your creativity and crash them. When you crash someone on Design Crasher, you’ll see their latest designs, who they are crashing, and stay up to date on their designs. Have a question or comment? Let Crashers know what you think about their designs directly under their post!

Wait, but what is a Crasher? Design Crasher users are considered Crashers. Crashers are the best type of creators. They inspire one another and are ready to share their designs with the world. Do you have what it takes to be a Crasher?

Clone – Are we seeing double? Creativity includes building on one another’s ideas. Like a Crasher’s design? Clone it and make it your own with your personal touches. When you clone a Crasher’s design, you’re making a copy of what it looks like at that time. Remember, you can then edit it to your liking. Cloning is the best way to collaborate on designs.

Like something you see? Give it a “like”! “Likes” let Crashers know you appreciate their work. The more “likes” a design gets – the more Crashers get exposure. Interior design now made easy!

Compete in challenges! Every Sunday, we release a new design challenge for you to put your design skills to the test. To enter, design the given room according to the challenge rules to have a chance at being crowned that week’s Design Challenge Winner. Not only does your design get featured on all our social media channels, but you also get bragging rights for the week!

Happy Crashing, Crashers!

apps.title: Logo Maker: Watermark Designer
apps.description:
Create your logo in five minutes!
Logo Maker offers you a quick and easy way to design a logo for your business brand or personal needs even without any design experience. 

Suitable For:
-Business owners
-Artists
-Designers
-Photographers
-Event planners
-Students
-DIY gifts
-Social media images
-Specially festivals

Main Features:
- Generate logos in a few steps
- High-resolution save in PNG or JPG
- 3000+ logo patterns for more personalization
- Massive creative templates for customization
- Unique personality fonts to create stunning typography artwork
- Hundreds of featured backgrounds
- Unlimited combinations - Generate matching logos intelligently
- Easy-to-use interface

What can you do with Logo Maker’s logo?
- Watermarks making for your photos, game screenshots or other images shared to the public
- Posters and flyers making
- Business card making
- Birthday cards creating
- Quick signatures for social media posts, such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram Posts
- Unique personal lock screen/home screen creating

SUBSCRIPTION FOR PREMIUM FEATURES:
Logo Maker offers 3 auto-renewing subscription options:
Weekly $5.99
Monthly $13.49	
Yearly $45.99

Premium Features:
- No ADS
- Remove App Watermark
- Unlock All Logos
- Unlock All Backgrounds
- Unlock All Unique Fonts
- Save in PNG
- Add Local Photos
- All Content
 
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase

Terms of Service: http://www.logomaster.org/terms_of_service.html
Privacy Policy: http://www.logomaster.org/privacy_policy.html
Website: https://logomaker2018.blogspot.com/2023/09/logo-maker-app.html

apps.description:
OVERVIEW
Download our app and dis cover Gilt’s ever-changing assortment of top designers and one-of-a-kind experiences – all right at your fingertips. Shop on the go and get incredible steals for women, men, kids and home to inspire every facet of your life. Plus, find deals for unforgettable experiences available in your city.

SHOP OUR APP FOR:
+ Luxury and more designer brands at up to 70% off retail prices: Valentino, Stuart Weitzman, John Varvatos… to name a few.
+ New Sales with the latest inventory every day, plus longer-lasting shops arranged by style, trend and category.
+ Real-time reminders when Sales are on, so you never miss out.
+ Offers and exclusive experiences in your city. Gilt City has national deals and local offers in New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, San Francisco, Seattle, Boston, Atlanta, Houston, Dallas, Miami, Philadelphia, and Washington, DC.

CATEGORIES
+ Women: Trending dresses and skirts, shirts and sweaters, outerwear, denim and activewear. You will also find deals on intimates and loungewear, pants and shorts, and suits and blazers, along with swim and maternity brands. Plus, luxury shoes and trending jewelry and watches, as well as health and beauty musts.
+ Men: Trending outerwear, suits and sport coats, sweaters and hoodies, and stylish denim. Save on shoes, activewear, pants and shorts, and polos and tees. You will also find deals on trending swim, as well as socks, underwear and sleepwear.
+ Kids: Clothing, shoes and accessories for girls and boys. Save on toys, games and books. Plus, get amazing deals on baby gear.
+ Home: Savings on luxe bedding and bath, trending decor and accessories, and kitchen and tabletop. Find deals on bedroom and outdoor furniture, stylish luggage, pet accessories, and much more.
+ City: Exclusive local one-of-a-kind experiences and packages at great deals. Explore your city and save at the same time.

QUESTIONS?
Email Customer Service at customerservice@gilt.com

apps.title: Designer City
apps.description:
Free Offline City Building Game – No Wait Times! Tired of waiting to build? In this free offline city building game there are no timers—you control the pace. Design your city, expand your skyline, and create a thriving metropolis with 2,000+ landmarks and skyscrapers.


BUILD YOUR CITY, YOUR WAY

Construct houses, apartments and skyscrapers to attract residents. Create jobs with commercial and industrial buildings. Add city services, sports, leisure and community buildings, parks and decorations to keep everyone happy. Design a unique city skyline filled with landmarks, monuments and world-famous towers.


BECOME A CITY TYCOON

Happy citizens work harder and generate more income for you to reinvest. Manage transportation networks of roads, railways, subways and highways to keep people moving. Build airports, seaports and farms to boost business, trade and food supply. Expand beyond the city with an army, navy, air force and even a space program.


STRATEGY AND SIMULATION

Choose how you want to play:
• Relax and design a beautiful city skyline.
• Use advanced analytics and statistics to optimize your city.
• Manage pollution, zoning, services and revenue like a true city tycoon.


DYNAMIC AND UNIQUE

Every city is different thanks to dynamic land generation. Shape the landscape however you want - add rivers, mountain ranges, forests and lakes. Create a green, carbon-neutral city using renewable power and public transport, or build a bustling downtown packed with skyscrapers and real life buildings.


ENDLESS CITY BUILDING FUN

With almost 2,000 buildings, trees and decorations, no two cities will ever be the same. Reset and build again on a brand-new landscape. Climb the leaderboards with your dream city.


PLAY FREE, OFFLINE OR ONLINE

Designer City can be played completely free. No internet connection required. Optional in-game purchases are available if you wish to expand even faster.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Many new buildings have been added.
New City Advisor screen: quickly see all the problems in your city.
Improved Bus Rapid Transit: buses now spawn and stop at bus stops, reducing car traffic and improving network efficiency.
New: Sports category! Sports buildings now generate income, and upgrading them adds more jobs. This update may affect your city’s balance.
New difficulty levels in the chess mini-game — play at the level that suits you best.

Number formatting now matches your language.
Performance improvements
Many other fixes and improvements.

apps.title: Home Design : Paradise Life
apps.description:
Ever dreamed of a tropical lifestyle? Create the ultimate tropical getaways, island lifestyle inspired custom interiors and holiday vacation resorts, and spa. Each new episode features a new interior or exterior design with a fascinating beach view and different HGTV like clients who took a leap of faith and moved to the islands to pursue a Paradise life: brothers, celebrities, families with kids, and the newlyweds. Go all-out and give a masterclass to make their home interiors memorable. Improve your home design skills and master makeovers by creating visually stunning rooms with Ocean views. You will have access to high-end furniture from Pinterest.

-Indulge in your hobby by following a creative home design masterclass with furniture from Pinterest
-Construct and renovate houses, and follow the process throughout the remodel
-Build rooms from scratch with most trending furniture
-Discover your artistic ability by making creative choices for your property
-Learn about inspiring, vibrant architecture
-Learn how to find your style, how to work with pattern and how to use lighting


Are you ready to live on a tropical island? Bask in the tropical sunshine and build best homes on sandy beaches, while enjoying the tropical turquoise sea.




Home Design: Paradise Life is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Home Design: Paradise Life? Learn more about the game!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PurpleCowStudios/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/purplecowstudio_cookapps/

apps.title: Fidget Spinner Designer
apps.description:
Design your own fidget spinners! Mix and match for over 300,000 possible combinations!

Compete to see how many spins you can get in 30 seconds in Challenge mode or just spin forever in Endless mode.

You can put your thumb in the center of the spinner just like the real thing without affecting the spinning.

A unique Flip button lets you flip the spinner, and a 3D rotate slider lets you see it from every angle.

Night mode turns the lights off automatically when you are using your spinner has LED lights or glow in the dark colors.

apps.title: Home Design : Stay Here
apps.description:
Ever wondered to know what it feels like to run your own interior design HGTV show? Now you can with the newest home design game, the best home decorating game with 3d graphics and creative aesthetic designs that were inspired by the interior design on the Pinterest platform. The furniture choices came from Ashley and Ikea home furniture and decor stores. 

Become an expert in interior design by working side by side with a professional interior designer Lucas and a real estate mogul, Taylor. Redecorate rooms applying stylish patterns. Start your home design journey and make your design home dreams come true!



What makes Home Design: Stay Here so special?

Design home and redecorate houses for charismatic characters, your clients are counting on you!
Explore your creativity, find inspiration from Pinterest, Ashley, Ikea influenced furniture designs and show off your designer skills.
Make creative choices and build your own dream home. You decide you choose!
Sharpen your decorating skills in weekly Episodes and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to high-end furniture and decor brands. 
 Improve your design skills and gain inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

If you like to watch HGTV property renovation, home design shows, like Fixer Upper and Property Brothers, then Home Design: Stay Here is a perfect virtual interior design game for you and if you enjoy playing games like Homescapes, Gardenscapes, Fishdom, and Township, you'll also enjoy Stay Here! Addictive gameplay with tons of decorating options is waiting for you!



*Please note that Home Design: Stay Here is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Stay Here saves your progress on your device. Data will be reset if you delete the app or change your device.*

We are Purple Cow Studio at Cookapps. We all love to watch home remodeling shows and browse Pinterest for inspiring interior photos. We create home decor games we love to play ourselves. If you're into home design, join our vibrant design community on:

apps.title: ArchAI - AI Garden Designer
apps.description:
Transform Your Space with ArchAI - AI Home & Garden Designer!



Tired of imagining how your home could look with a new style or layout? Want to effortlessly visualize multiple design options tailored to your taste? ArchAI - AI Home Designer is here to bring your interior and exterior design dreams to life with the power of advanced AI.



Instant Design Magic at Your Fingertips



Capture any room or exterior of your home with a photo, and let ArchAI instantly generate stunning design concepts. Our cutting-edge AI algorithms take the guesswork out of design, offering you beautifully optimized visualizations in just seconds. Whether you’re planning a quick refresh or a full home transformation, ArchAI has you covered.



Explore a World of Styles



With ArchAI, you can experiment with over 10 diverse design styles, from the sleek minimalism of modern interiors to the rustic charm of farmhouse aesthetics. Love the idea of a Zen-inspired living room or a Mediterranean-style patio? Simply select your desired style, and ArchAI will show you how it can transform your space. The possibilities are endless, and the choice is yours.



Tailored Recommendations Beyond Style



ArchAI goes beyond just showing you new looks. It provides detailed recommendations on furniture, decor, color schemes, and more, ensuring that every element of your design works in perfect harmony. Create a space that not only looks beautiful but also feels cohesive and inviting.



Save, Share, and Collaborate



Keep your favorite designs saved and easily accessible for when you’re ready to make changes. Share your creations with friends, family, or even professional designers to gather feedback and collaborate on bringing your vision to life. ArchAI makes it easy to refine your ideas and achieve the perfect look for your home.



Get Inspired and Get Started



Looking for fresh ideas? Explore ArchAI’s inspiration feed, filled with stunning design concepts and creative possibilities. Discover new styles you’ve never considered and get inspired to try something bold and new in your own space.



Why Choose ArchAI - AI Home Designer?



-Effortlessly visualize and explore design ideas tailored to your taste.
-Access a diverse range of styles for both interiors and exteriors.
-Receive detailed, AI-powered recommendations for every aspect of your design.
-Save and share your favorite designs to refine and perfect your vision.
-Find endless inspiration to spark your creativity.

Download ArchAI: AI Home Designer today and unlock a world of design possibilities. Reimagine your space, redefine your style, and create the home you’ve always dreamed of all with the power of AI.
______________________

For support or suggestions, contact us at support@connectinno.com

apps.title: Logo Maker & Design Creator ‣
apps.description:
Need a logo but don't have the patience? Then this app is for you.

Type in your logo name, an optional slogan, or a tagline, and get hundreds of unique options to choose from.

Save the ones you like, tweak the colors to your liking, and export all the variants you need which include:

- High quality 4000 x 4000px versions of the logo you have just selected as a PNG file
- An "infinite" quality vector PDF file, that allows your logo to be crisp as any required size
- A version with the logo flush to the sides
- A black and white version
- An alternative variation
- And a considered mix of these, to make sure you have all you need, whatever the use-case!

Want to try a different name or slogan? Not a problem. Tap customize and change it in a heartbeat.

So how does it work?
Whilst most logos are unique, they all follow a set of design rules. We've programmed these rules, matched up fonts, tweaked the ligatures and letter combinations to give you a unique result within seconds.

Terms of service: https://seeable.io/terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://seeable.io/privacy

apps.title: FlipaClip: Create 2D Animation
apps.description:
Learn how to Animate Movies with FlipaClip!

Discover Your Unique Animation Style
Dive into the world of animation today! FlipaClip is the perfect platform for beginners and aspiring animators who dream about making animated movies effortlessly.

Easy Tutorials
• Learn with guided how-to content and get Inspired: Access tutorials and join our community for inspiration and guidance.

Powerful and Intuitive Animation Tools
• Art Tools: Use a variety of brushes, lasso, fill, eraser, ruler shapes, mirror tool, and text options. Draw on custom canvas sizes with Apple Pencil support.
• Animation Layers: Animate like a pro with up to 10 layers. Try the Glow Effect and Pixel Effect for free.
• Audio Integration: Add sound effects, voiceovers, and music tracks. Create, add, and edit audio clips across six free audio tracks. Record your own voice for dialogue and import personal audio files. Explore our curated sound effects packages.
• Blur & Smudge Tools: Create stunning effects with these highly anticipated tools..
• Magic Cut AI Tool: Cut out any image or picture with advanced Ai..

Frame-by-Frame Animation Made Simple
• Timeline and Onion Skin: Perfect for precise animation control.
• Frames Viewer and Scrub Control: Ensure a seamless workflow.
• Overlay Grid: Align and frame your drawings accurately.

Personalized Experience
• Dark and Light Mode: Customize your app’s appearance.
• Organize Projects: Stack projects and manage them efficiently.

Stage Customization
• Hide Tools: Create more space for your animations or projects by hiding tools.
• Drag & Rearrange Tools: Customize your layout by dragging and rearranging tool icons for the perfect setup.

Creators Making All Kinds of Animation Styles
Animators are producing animated styles like Cartoons, Memes, Animé, Stick Figures, Stickman, Drawing, Animated Pictures, Stop Motion, Gacha, Gâcha Life, Furry, Sketch, Music Animated Videos, Animals, Fandom, Scribbs or Scribbles on dance videos, and more. Gamers will love creations of Roblox characters, Minecraft, Battle Royale, and others!

Community and Sharing
• Join a Thriving Community: Share your animations with a global audience.
• Participate in Challenges: Win exciting prizes in various contests.
• Social Media Integration: Post directly to TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Twitter/X, Bilibili, Facebook, Tumblr, and more.

Insert Photos & Videos
• Animate on top of images or videos: Create rotoscope effortlessly and drag and drop images on your canvas.

Save and Share
• Multiple Export Options: Save your work as MP4, GIF, or PNG sequences. Post your animated videos to YouTube and TikTok directly from the app.

Watch Animated Shorts
• Streaming Feature: Enjoy a selection of curated animated short movies created by our community..

Join Millions of FlipaClip Creators and share your unique animated stories.

Support and Community
• Website: www.flipaclip.com
• Support: support.flipaclip.com
• Discord: discord.com/invite/flipaclip
